Reviews.Title: Great display!

Reviews.Author: Dan Lowe
Reviews.Content: My main reason for considering the upgrade from the HD to the HDX was web browsing. The Silk browser on the HD wasn't responsive enough. With the HDX, browsing is snappy!!! I honestly can't remember when I was so satisfied with a purchase. Great value! :-)
Reviews.Title: WORTH THE UPGRADE FROM THE FIRE HD

Reviews.Author: Mireille Lacomere Schild "Mireille in the woods"
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th Kindle and 2nd Kindle Fire.  The HDX is a big improvement. The quality of movie watching is wonderful.  I do not mind the small 7" format because, in return, I have a small unit that fits in my purse. I have purchased a month by month service with AT&T; which allows me to be connected on the road when WiFi is not available.  The Mayday help feature is the very best help that you can hope for.  I highly recommend it.
Reviews.Title: I love this one!

Reviews.Author: John Lewis
Reviews.Content: After having a Nook, which I love, I am blown away by the quality of this product.The Kindle Fire HDX out does the Nook in display, speed, downloads, movies, streaming, content, apps, and offers more storage on the device and with the Cloud. I am happy with my Nook, but I love my Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Superior Product

Reviews.Author: samuel kulla
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying it so far other than that screen being a little small for me I think it has terrific features. In addition I am recording this message which is a very nice feature
Reviews.Title: Enjoying the fire

Reviews.Author: Velvet's Mom
Reviews.Content: I have resisted buying an e-reader for several years.Vision problems made me finally decide to try one.Why did I wait so long? I use it every day, not just to read, but to play games, and to check email when away from home.You can teach old dogs new tricks!!
Reviews.Title: Love It!

Reviews.Author: Mary Eaves "KinzMom09"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle!  My daughter loves to read, and I love the variety of books that are available right at our fingertips.  Zero complaints, zero issues.  Love it!
Reviews.Title: Wonderful!

Reviews.Author: Kelly G.
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire! No problems as of yet but I'm loving my Kindle and got my oldman into it to lol
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: cody
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire!  It was worth every penny.  I have the first Kindle and only used it to read books.  This one is amazing.  I can play games use the internet and so much more.  It was a good price and quick ship.  Thank you Amazon!
Reviews.Title: This is the best

Reviews.Author: P. Bronecky "georgie girl"
Reviews.Content: I have wanted this for months! And when it came up on this special, I couldn't resist. It's wonderful. I take it everywhere, it's compact, very readable and I haven't found anything I can't do on it yet. My husband has his iPad, my kindle does as much as it does, for much less cost. The apps abound. My husband and I each have the third gen kindle, I bought a appetite for my sister as a gift, so I am a die-hard kindle user. I almost never touch my laptop anymore.A friend was going to get his wife an iPad for Christmas, but I talked him into an HDX for her and she loves hers too!Keep it up, Amazon, you're amaz-ing-on!
Reviews.Title: It's my Precious...

Reviews.Author: Susie Hoskinson "sushosk"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle. It is easy to use and now with the Mayday button there is help at any time. The graphics on all my games are so clear. Just love my Kindles.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Tommy Squitieri
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is outstanding. It has exceeded my expectations. It is easy to use and has so many apps to choose from. It has improved my reading and helped me with my professional emailing.
Reviews.Title: More than expected

Reviews.Author: Will S.
Reviews.Content: I've had the Nook Simple touch and all the time was thinking I should have gotten the Kindle. While I like apple products, this kindle has some nice features the others don't... I love the immersion reading option... and it has all the apps I use available in the kindle app store.Pros:sleek and lightmost of the popular appstext to speech (reads to you)immersion experienceCons:Hard to see in sunlight (expected as its not e-ink)Makes buying things from Amazon a bit too easy!Very happy with the purchase...
Reviews.Title: This thing is great!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Enjoy because I can read books and also use the web.  So easy to travel with.  No more taking laptop
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Edna C. Brooks "sassy reader"
Reviews.Content: Im very happy with my Kindle Fire HDX.  It's easy to operate and there are so many apps out there I can download.  With the 2 yr Protection Plan, I really feel safer using the Fire. I was trully happy about the affordable price that I paid for the fire.  Im on a tight budget and it worked out just fine for me.  Thanks Amazon
Reviews.Title: HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY

Reviews.Author: Purple Yo
Reviews.Content: So, I'm having some trouble getting used to this kindle since I'm used to apple products, and I wasn't sure if I had the patience to learn it until I discovered and used the mayday feature.  I'm so sick of searching message boards every time I have a problem with an electronic device or electronic service of some sort.  When web-based technology works well, it is amazingly convenient, but when there is a problem with something you've come to depend on, it is so hard to get help.  Especially with a 2 year old tugging at your...everything.  However, the Mayday feature of my new kindle is fantastic.  To have a person who can hear your voice answer your questions immediately, and solve your issue within seconds is just invaluable to this busy mom.  No more email back and forth conversations with customer service reps that didn't read the entirety of my message or didn't answer my question fully, necessitating a problem solving session lasting for days.  A person and a voice that can respond immediately is a breath of fresh air.  I would have given the Kindle HDX 3 or 4 stars before using Mayday (mostly because I prefer the Mac look but and feel and probably should have bought an ipad mini) but this service is just so impressive and beats having to go to a genius bar and wait in line for 45 minutes or more that I'm completely sold on the Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Mayday feature is un-freaking-believable

Reviews.Author: Eva "Eva"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it!  The picture quality is awesome. I didn't realize it came with an app for the children. I love the way I get to control what they are able to do on it! I definitely want to get a Kindle for each of my children!
Reviews.Title: Awesome!

Reviews.Author: Chuck Johnson
Reviews.Content: Upgraded from Kindle HD for the additional features.  The screen resolution is fantastic.  The sound while listening to audiobooks and movies is very good.  Would recommend the Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Upgraded from Kindle HD

Reviews.Author: randy
Reviews.Content: this 57 year old is not pc smart. but with the help of granddaughter showing me through the steps set up and downloads I feel comfortable with the kindle fire and kindle support was greatbut just fine any child that has a phone I pad etc and you got an instructor
Reviews.Title: hey i can do it

Reviews.Author: Stacie "Goliath1357"
Reviews.Content: I do not own any Apple products because I find them very expensive and not very durable. The Kindle meets most of my needs that I wanted from a tablet. I was able to get all my streaming services for tv shows and movies (Netflix, Hulu, DramaFever, Viki and Youtube). I got most of my social apps (Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Pinterest, Instagram-a bit tricky but doable and Skype).I don't play many games but there were a few I downloaded and enjoy (Word Chums, Jewels). There are tons of writing apps for lists and notes. I have found many useful lifestyle apps (food diaries, calorie counters, etc). I was also surprised how many language apps there were, I downloaded some great ones for Korean and Spanish. The one thing that I am still working on figuring out is a good app for music-I use the Pandora and Spotify apps but I want to get my music onto my kindle to listen to for when I'm somewhere without wifi. The battery is good and the camera is great. I would highly recommend this product to anyone wanting an inexpensive but versatile tablet.
Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Author: Darlene McMillan
Reviews.Content: I love all my kindle but of all of them this is the best one I will recommend this  one  and the fire hd
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx

Reviews.Author: Teng Li
Reviews.Content: Good shape, size and easy to use. Only one tiny problem is the battery not last too long, 6-7 hours approx.
Reviews.Title: Really good

Reviews.Author: DGK
Reviews.Content: I was deciding between this and an iPad for my two children.  Ultimately the choice came down to price, and Kindle FreeTime (for kids).  The iPad *may* be better for adults used to iPhones (and they may not be) but for kids, FreeTime provides an ad-free and in app purchase free experience at only 4$ per month.  Apple has NOTHING like this, so kindle wins hands down.FreeTime is really the greatest thing.  Kids easily are able to scroll through apps, videos, and books (read pop up books, self reading books, learn to read books).  They understand the interface and enjoy it.  Way better than iPad which is much less interactive, if you stop to think about it.
Reviews.Title: Better than iPad for kids and half the price

Reviews.Author: Leigh
Reviews.Content: Also a good e-reader. Only complaint is the keyboard. Sometimes when typing out an email I accidentally hit the menu button rather than the space bar. Other than that, no complaints!
Reviews.Title: great little tablet

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Whether I'm playing Apps or watching movies or viewing Youtube, this thing is flawless. I spend time on it every day. I recommend getting the Netflix app. Awesome!!!
Reviews.Title: this thing is Awesome!!!

Reviews.Author: Andrew M Weaver
Reviews.Content: Nice all around device. Bought it for my wife for surfing the web and checking email but knew she would keep reading books on her regular Kindle. She said she "could" read a book on it but likes her other Kindle better for reading.
Reviews.Title: FIRE!! Ha, Ha, Ha...

Reviews.Author: Carrie L Hannum
Reviews.Content: This is the best Kindle ever! Graphics are so clear and colors are so bright! I am thoroughly delighted with this product and recomend it to anyone who is thinking of an upgrade or something new.
Reviews.Title: I can't believe I waited so long!

Reviews.Author: Jaylene Shrader
Reviews.Content: I'm thrilled I purchased this and it is used daily.  Pandora continuous, self-chosen, music is played daily (using the origami case to stand it upright almost always), it is used daily for many, many free downloaded game apps.  It has been used for doing Facebook (a few glitches to be worked out with this one -- mainly do to not liking to type with one finger since always have typed two handed), and I know the friend of mine I bought this tablet for uses it for several other apps, which I don't recall right now.  There are some downloaded, purchased, albums of favorite music to add to the free Pandora music.  Have not used free, downloaded Skype yet and not sure if my friend has used free YouTube, Netflix, Weather Channel and many other free apps.  So worth the investment and fastest internet speed for games!  And nice size, also.  When not in use, the screen is protected with the purchased origami cover.  Easy tablet to take anywhere.  Oh, also have the cord to plug it into outlet, when not running on battery.
Reviews.Title: A Buy Never Regretted

Reviews.Author: LINDA WEST
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this for me as a. Christmas present for lack of another idea.  It has been a great gift.  I can do everything on this that we do on the iPad. Yet small enough to fit in my purse and nice size keyboard.
Reviews.Title: Fills the bill for almost everything

Reviews.Author: Kelly O'shaughnessy
Reviews.Content: I initially hesitated on upgrading my kindle to the Kindle HDX 7", but I am so glad I did! It is much more versatile then I expected. I am working n my master's degree and I was able to add several of my textbooks on the kindle. It is easy to navigate and I actually use it just as much if not more then my I-pad.
Reviews.Title: Great investment

Reviews.Author: Sara Collins
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is everything it promised.  Amazon's service has been the very best possible.I absolutely recommend this tablet to everyone!
Reviews.Title: Great!

Reviews.Author: NDT
Reviews.Content: I'm an avid Apple product user and not a fan of Android phone OS.  However, this product exceeds my expectations.  The color, brightness, clarity of display is just stunning.  The sound quality is also top notch.  The speed blew me away!  It moves from app to app with great speed.  I love the ability to highlight, write notes, etc. on books and PDF files.  I also like that there is a "on device" and "cloud" app storage so I can move apps to the Cloud when I don't want them for a time.  It's very light and easy to handle.  I like the swipe texting, also.  I'm not bothered by the special offers.  It's allowed me to catch some deals I may not have noticed otherwise.  It's ways to buy apps.  While the app store isn't up to par with Apple, it's been just fine so far.  There's Candy Crush, which is important, of course :) I own an iPad, too; but it's too big and heavy for me to read and use for school work.  So husband took ownership of that and I'm in love with my new Kindle.  Seriously.  Love it.  Got a Poetic magnetic cover and it works great!
Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS!

Reviews.Author: Jabez
Reviews.Content: Good tablet overall but the thing is the appstore its has about 10x less than the apple apps in the appstore
Reviews.Title: Decent tablet

Reviews.Author: Barbara C.
Reviews.Content: I love it!  For the price, it is a wonderful device. I purchased it because of it's e-reading ability, access to libraries, and facebook and email. Pandora is a plus. And, even though some difficulty, I transferred my I-tunes. I have a newer Mac, and my Mac does not recognize the device. However, that is not a reason to not purchase it. The picture is wonderful and the sound is incredible.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Linda Comstock
Reviews.Content: I loved my previous Kindle Fire.  This new one, the Kindle Fire HDX, has the worst battery life I've ever seen. I KNOW there is better batteries Amazon could use, but I supposed you want us to just buy another Kindle when our current one dies.  As you're surfing the web or playing a game you can see the percentage of battery life constantly being drained; in 20 minutes it's drained 10% or more.  Have to charge it almost every day.  I don't expect this one to last as long as my first one.  Also, when I want a book to read, I scan the titles and click on the ones that look interesting to me, but when I go back to the previous page of the list of books, it doesn't take me back to where I was and I have to start scrolling through them again starting at the first one.  I miss being able to click on the top of the screen to get to settings.  Regarding email, several times now I've forwarded an email and it comes to ME from ME instead of the person I forwarded it to, and the original one I forwarded from has disappeared.  The lousy battery life is my main complaint, however.  My husband has an iPad, and he charges it maybe once a week.  Next time I'm buying an iPad.
Reviews.Title: Not as good

Reviews.Author: JHL
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my Kindle Fire so far. It's easy to use and provides a high-quality experience for reading e-Books, browsing the Internet and watching video. It's also compact and great for taking on a business trip. I actually used it for Skyping with my family the last time I was away, and it would be worth it just for that capability alone.
Reviews.Title: Convenient and dependable

Reviews.Author: citygal "Salsera"
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet. I like the integration with Amazon Prime movies. The only thing I don't like is the keyboard. I consistently hit the menu key that's situated at the bottom of the spacebar and it continuously fouls me up. It's really frustrating. Will need to find a way to change the keyboard layout.
Reviews.Title: Nice tablet, but...

Reviews.Author: Miss-Daphne "Miss-Daphne"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle fire for the Microsoft Word Feature. I based my purchase on reading reviews from other people on this website. Overall I am pleasantly pleased with my Kindle fire I can surf the Internet at a very fast speed, and I love the free apps it came with. I did not choose the special offers package because I do not care for a lot of advertising. The apps are easy to download and so far my Kindle is very easy for me to manage.  So far I can use my Kindle for two full days and not have my battery run down. The only downside to purchasing this Kindle is the fact that I had to pay $14.95 for the Microsoft Office feature. In reference to another persons comment on here I would like to verify the truth when it comes to Microsoft Office you do need the Internet in order to download the app but you do not need it to type or use most of the basic features. I was able to type a full research paper on this Kindle for my Geography class. So in my opinion it does the job I will update in a few more months after I've had a chance to use a lot of the other features hope this helps.
Reviews.Title: Great Kindle Fire....

Reviews.Author: ryan Clements
Reviews.Content: This was the wedding gift I gave my wife. The HDX is more responsive and faster than a ASUS 650.00 tablet the ASUS TF700 Infinity.Totally worth every penny. Easist thing in the world to use and Great Customer Service Support via Remote help at the whim of the user.
Reviews.Title: Bought this for my wife! :-D

Reviews.Author: Elvira M. Feldman
Reviews.Content: Still trying to get use to this Kindle but, so far so good. Really like the vivid color. Just wish a cheat sheet on how to work it came with it.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7

Reviews.Author: D & T
Reviews.Content: I have waited to get a tablet, "really did I need one". Turns out yes! Great little unit, small enough to carry in my purse, yet big enough to read on regularly. All while keeping me connected to my email and news! And audiobooks are great to listen to on this or through my home or car stereo.
Reviews.Title: So happy I did this!

Reviews.Author: Kimberly Dreher
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tablet. We are enjoying the use of it, but had some initial difficulties with it dropping wifi connections and not finding hotspots. Fixing it required a new tablet. The return process was easy enough, but Amazon issued a refurbished unit as our replacement, which shouldn't have happened as our unit was brand new, so we had to return that one also. Amazon eventually shipped us a replacement new item, and it is functioning well.
Reviews.Title: Very nice, but some wifi issues initially

Reviews.Author: R O "r o"
Reviews.Content: This has been a Great replacement for my laptop. All I do is email, browse the net etc. And of course READ!
Reviews.Title: lovelovlove

Reviews.Author: A. D. Hunt "God   I S   love"
Reviews.Content: NO WAY TO TAKE  PHOTOS  -  O H  WELLI  WILL CALL FOR HELP ON HOW TO DOWNLOAD  MOVIES & GOOD BOOKS
Reviews.Title: JUST LEARNING TO USE - THANKS

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "harlen"
Reviews.Content: Good device but a little difficult to navigate. also feel like the ports and switches could be at different locations
Reviews.Title: good divice

Reviews.Author: Nagarajan
Reviews.Content: Value for the money..Dolby soundLatest HardwareOnly Amazon apps available for install. if google apps available by default would be excellent
Reviews.Title: Simple and Good

Reviews.Author: Lucas Farnum "Lucas"
Reviews.Content: Overall, I really like the Kindle Fire HDX. it's very easy to use It has a very sharp screen, , and the price is right. It's the best tablet to consume Amazon content (along with the larger 8.9" Fire HDX tablet) and one of the two best 7" tablets for the price (along with the Google Nexus 7).
Reviews.Title: Amazon does it again!

Reviews.Author: Gail M Lipomi
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE FIRE.  IT IS THINNER AND LIGHTER TO HANDLE THAN THE KINDLE FIRE.  THE IMAGES ARE VERY CLEAR AND THE COLORS ARE VIVID.
Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm very please with my new kindle, but I am also pleased to have a grand daughter who is more literate on technology than I am. I  especially like the combatability of the kindle with my iPad and computer with the Kindle apps. Mary
Reviews.Title: Oh, to have the ability to use the new equipment that is on the market now.

Reviews.Author: Brian Newton
Reviews.Content: This is the best kindle yet! I had the prior models but HD is so much better. Faster, cleaner, easy to use and a wonderful HD picture, seems like it's 3-D.
Reviews.Title: HDX is the BEST

Reviews.Author: joanne medeiros
Reviews.Content: It has its uses but it is not as handy as I thought it would be the Silk system drops pages often and once I have all my questions written down will be using mayday button a lot wish it was simpler to use no folders for bookmarks and the apps I have down loaded don't for the most part do what they say they will also does not seem to support adobe or at least that is what it tells me have not figured out how to find things in cloud that I have stored. Actually it makes me feel like I need a dummies book to work it
Reviews.Title: still figuring it out

Reviews.Author: Connie M. Brandon "connie6005"
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle Fire HDX very well and does all I need it to do.  I am a sitter at the hospital and it works well for what I need it to do.  And with my Prime, I can do most anything and much cheaper.  I love the borrow books on it but I think the borrow books should be 2 a month instead of one.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about this Kindle! I recently had a loooong day of traveling, which included long boring flights and layovers. My Kindle kept me from getting bored and time flew on the plane! (no pun intended) Seriously, I downloaded a bunch of free movies and I was good to go! Everyone should own a Kindle!!!
Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE!!!

Reviews.Author: Jcrunk
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife. So far she loves it. Its easy to use, small enough to carry around and we have had no issues with it. The screen is awesome and the resolution shows every detail. Its even easy enough for my  3y/o daughter to turn on cartoons to watch if she wants.Before I bought this I saw some people complaining about the faint blue border when viewing white screens. For us it hasn't bothered us in the least. It's so faint its hard to even tell its there unless you look for it and it hasn't been a distraction at all. My only complaint would have to do with some of the game apps my daughter uses. One of them won't let you change the volume unless you exit the game, but this could be caused by the app itself not the kindle. I would definitly recommend.
Reviews.Title: My wife loves it.

Reviews.Author: Carlin Lau
Reviews.Content: Awesome device. I love all the Kindle Fire devices including the Kindle reader. The best part about the Kindle devices is the excellent customer service.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: If I had to use one word to describe the Kindle Fire HDX7 I would call it Fun.  It is easy to use and the vibrant color display is just another bonus.  I bought it for my husband for Christmas because he has a hard time logging in and out of my laptop and the size and ease of use is perfect for him.  He can happily check shop on ebay and amazon with ease now.  And the mayday button works exactly as described.  I would buy another one
Reviews.Title: Fun

Reviews.Author: Lisa Habets
Reviews.Content: Had to finally order one of my own and I love this one. It is a great size and it works so nicely. For the price it was a great deal.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: peggy
Reviews.Content: I have a Kindle Fire.  I do however have problems reading and watching movies while out in the sun.  Will I have a problem with the Kindle Fire HDX7?I am hesitant on ordering it if I'm going to have the same problem
Reviews.Title: Reading

Reviews.Author: Patty Murphy Flanagan
Reviews.Content: Why is there no app for an update for Flash Player?  I can not view any videos on Facebook. I have downloaded items and cannot open the files. Having a lot of issues with this!!!
Reviews.Title: Flash Player update for Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Ralf Herbrich
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet 4 months ago and have made excellent experience. The speakers are very clear and the screen is sharp - at a distance of 2'' the viewing experience for movies is the best compared to equivalent tablets like Nexus 7 or iPad 3 (I own both of them). The only downside is the browser which sometimes does not render HTML5 correctly. Email and calendar are somewhat hidden but once found, clearly allow to review meetings and view combined inboxes.
Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet - in particular for watching movies

Reviews.Author: Diane Corvington
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this kindle to anyone.  I am still learning how to use it and have downloaded a book on how to use it.  So far it is user friendly.  It's nice to get my email on it and also to shop for more books.  I only wish that there were more general directions that came with the kindle that I could refer back to.  I know in time I'll learn all about it.  Wonderful to have when you travel as we do - it certainly takes up less room than all the books on it would if they were hardback or paperback for sure!
Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Billy Jones
Reviews.Content: love it. works fine very, very glad I bought it.the movies look great . the audio books sound very good
Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Author: Karielk
Reviews.Content: I tried a different brand,  thinking getting away from amazon may be better,  but i found the other name brand tablet lagged going into sites like facebook and weatherbug etc.  to the point it was annoying.  i missed watching things on amazon prime,  so i took it back and got this hdx and it is awesome.  it goes into these sites immediately,  so clear and i love it.  I'll stay with kindlefire
Reviews.Title: Really Enjoying This HDX

Reviews.Author: melody
Reviews.Content: this was bought as a gift and the person really likes it. connects to wifi really fast and has great content
Reviews.Title: kindle

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like my Kindle and enjoy the convenience, but I do not like the connection port.  The plug that goes into the Kindle is slanted and takes several tries to get it plugged in correctly.  That is why I did not give 5 stars.  The actual Kindle is great and easy to use.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: Lori Majors
Reviews.Content: Got my kindle fire for Christmas. I have used it quite a bit now and would recommend it to many. I have downloaded books, browsed the internet,  do facebook, taken pictures, and downloaded a texting app.  I have done all of this with little or no difficulty considering I am not very tech savvy and do not have a cell phone. The only  negative I have about the kindle fire HDX is adobe flash player is not available for this or any newer device, but haven't really missed it that much. A lot of things from youtube will still stream, as upgrades are made.  Some videos from Facebook play while others do not, but if it is something I really want to see I look on my laptop. All in all, I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.
Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX!!!

Reviews.Author: Caryn
Reviews.Content: The complaints regarding a flickering screen and the blue/purple haze around the edges that I read about before purchasing, unfortunately have also held true with the one I purchased and received….i've read four books on my kindle since purchasing and the blue haze around the edges is definitely noticeable, especially when reading in a dark room.  I don't know if it's worth returning…since its not strictly an e-reader (one can do many other things on the kindle other than read…all of which are fun, interactive and are not afflicted with the blue haze border…if it was just an e-reader and it had the blue/purple haze that would be a deal breaker) it doesn't make the book too hard to read, but its distracting, and certainly puts a strain on the eyes.  The flickering screen also creeps up from time to time when I'm playing different apps (candy crunch app is when I usually see it…all the candies flicker like someones turning a light on and off).  It lasts only a few seconds then stops…these things I think are what keep this good tablet from being a great tablet.  Amazon needs to address the issues.  Other than that, I love it.
Reviews.Title: Love it, but…..

Reviews.Author: Rachel J
Reviews.Content: I got this for my father for Christmas. Best gift I could have invested in. It has similar qualities to an Ipad but for a 1/4 of the cost. Highly recommended
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Bert
Reviews.Content: I find the Kindle HDX 7" so much better than my first version.  The features and the clarityof the display are great and the price is just right.  I love my Kindle and I always take it with me.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" is a Big Bang for your Buck

Reviews.Author: Dianne Wildman
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle all the time.  It is so easy  to use.  I like all the features available.  Love the books.  The screen is so easy to read
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: The screen is illuminated beautifully. I also love the page layout. I have the same books on my mini-IPad and time and again Kindle has the pages that are easier on the eye. I love this device!
Reviews.Title: Kindle convert

Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I picked out this Kindle because of it's star rating. I am having a very hard time setting something's up, and understand something's, It would be so much nicer if this would of came with a manual. Reviews.Author: K. Normand
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 7" with 32GB as a replacement for my old Kindle, which had made its way into my son's bedroom, never to reappear (he is an avid reader). I did a LOT of research before I made my purchase and decided that this Kindle was the best fit for me. I was not disappointed!There are a few drawbacks:1. No SD card slot so on-board memory is all you get. This isn't a problem for me, since I don't have a whole lot of apps and cloud storage is available. (LOVE the cloud storage!!)2. Google apps are not supported. Reportedly people have gotten them to work on their Kindle but I wasn't able to get them going. I adapted - I get my Gmail via browser and use an alternate mapping app.3. Battery life isn't quite what I'd like, but manageable.Now for the pros:1. The size and weight is just right. It is comfortable to use - even hours on end like I do2. Clear, sharp images. I was quite impressed by how good things look on the Kindle Fire3. Cloud storage so if you get overloaded with apps or books, you can save them to the cloud for later retrieval4. A wide variety of apps will run on the Kindle Fire, ranging from games to Office apps.Once I got the Kindle Fire, I realized that I'd underestimated how much I'd use it. I not only use it for reading (which I do a lot!), but I also have Skype on it, several games, and a bunch of work-related applications. I use it to do some work-related tasks when it's not convenient to be at my computer. With the apps I've collected, I can do all of my work - even work that requires VPN -  on the Kindle - it's that good!I'll admit that the Kindle Fire is not for everyone. If you are expecting a full-blown tablet, you may not like this. It's total overkill if all you want to do is read books. If you absolutely MUST have the SD card slot or MUST run Google apps, then you should look elsewhere. However, if you are looking to read books and also watch movies or tv, play a few games, and run a few apps, then the Kindle Fire is an excellent choice.

Reviews.Author: Charles F. Hockenbarger
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, one for my wife and one for myself.  I love this tablet.  I've got multiple other tablets in the house for use by the 7 kids who have all but abandoned television to watch YouTube and other streaming media technologies, so I'm not new to tablet technology by any stretch of the imagination.The hardware is great. I wasn't sure about the 7" size, but have found that I love it.  I certainly think larger tablets have their place, but the convenience of the 7" form factor is really nice for media consumption (reading books and magazines, watching streaming video, etc.).  It fits in the hand easily, and for smaller kids the lighter weight and smaller size makes it easier for them to use when I want to loan it to one of the littler ones.  Battery life is okay, I went from full charge to around 60% after watching three TV show episodes back to back.  The display is crisp, colors bright; blacks could be a little deeper, but it's a 7" tablet not a 4K TV!  Sound is good, but I still question why the only vendor on the planet that gets that you should put speakers on the front of the device is HTC.  This is SUCH a no-brainer and if you want the strongest possible device for media consumption, put the speakers on the front!  That aside, the back-side speakers are pretty effective and sound is crisp with a pretty good range.I like the fact the system has 5GHz WiFi, my other tablets are all 2.4GHz, so bumping up out of that spectrum was nice, especially for streaming performance.The skin on top of Android is one of the better ones I've seen, certainly better than Asus or Samsung's skins (but I haven't gotten an opportunity to play with the MagazineUX yet, which is similar to Windows tiles which I really like).  I'd like to see more configurability for the carousel.  I haven't quite figured out the logic behind how things get added to or removed from it.  For example I view a Prime Instant Video and it shows up in the carousel, but after I pause it and look at something else, it pulls it out.  I'd like to pin Prime IV to the carousel permanently, and I don't see a way to do that.Of course having access to all the ebooks I've been reading via the Kindle app on my phone is awesome, and my wife loves the Newsstand feature.One nit about the software is that it doesn't interface properly to my Prime Instant Video, particularly my Watchlist.  For some reason it isn't reading that properly, so it doesn't see that I've got all the seasons of Doctor Who, for example queued up for viewing in my Watchlist like it does if I log into the website.  Again, a nit.The main reason this doesn't get 5 stars is actually a huge issue to me.  Not having Google Play access is almost a show-stopper.  The refusal of Amazon to work with Google and play in the ecosystem relegates the Fire to a media interface device, and it cannot become my primary tablet device.  So instead of going into my backpack when I travel on business, it sits on my bedside table for media viewing and reading at night, because my larger Samsung tablet can do everything the Kindle does and more, albeit in a larger and heavier device.  The Amazon app store is simply deficient and weak compared to Google Play, and there are a LOT of apps I use that are not available, particularly around system administration.  Of course not having the native Google apps is a big kludge, especially for a person who has carried an Android phone for years, has multiple Android tablets, and is a big fan of that ecosystem.  Even Samsung understands that not allowing the native Android apps is a bad thing, and while they push their custom versions of things, still allow you to use Google Play.  If Amazon decided to go 10" or so on a tablet, I wouldn't buy it for this reason alone.  Since I'm a geek, I don't mind having multiple devices, but for friends and family that want a single device for things beyond media consumption, I cannot recommend the Fire.  For non-technical users who want nothing BUT media consumption, the device rocks.And yes, I know I can sideload or I could root, but I don't want to have to go to that effort across multiple devices just to get proper Android access.Overall a very nice tablet implementation.

Reviews.Content: Picture is clear, fast processer,  so easy to use email features,  especially word choices when sending mail.  Great response to help button.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Jason Tabor
Reviews.Content: Seamless, easy to use, awesome app coverage, excellent video and great audio. Amazon amazing!! Just wish Amazon was more pro active when it was stolen. Seems they could have used the"mayday" backdoor to take video audio and location of thieves that stole. Used lookout app to locate it but still was unable to recover it. But I was close. Will buy a new one and be more vigilant in retaining possession of it
Reviews.Title: awesome tablet. needs better anti theft.

Reviews.Author: jacob olson
Reviews.Content: I've really enjoyed my kindle fire hdx from listening to music to reading, or just playing apps.  it's small light you can take it pretty much anywhere and it has a good battery life.
Reviews.Title: review

Reviews.Author: Bashir
Reviews.Content: Excellent especially mid day button, Very good for the whole family,books ,apps, photos internet and everything else, any problem the mid day button comes in handy, usually withing 15 sec and talk to live person you can see
Reviews.Title: Excellant

Reviews.Author: anthony w. williams
Reviews.Content: I was nervous to switch from a different reader to the Kindle, but found it so easy to use and navigate- I'm hooked
Reviews.Title: so easy to navigate!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is great product at a great price point. Easy to use, fun to play with and no worries, Amazon stand behind it like Sears did with craftsman's tools but better. Shipping was better than anyone else on timely manner and in great shape.Bought the first one for my child who loves it a lot. They even sleep with it and use it as an alarm clock. Read so many books it the best way to keep them read for fun and enjoyment. but does play some games on it. I like the easy way to keep control of the stuff, which they put on it and given time out for them to do other things
Reviews.Title: Great buy at  a Great price

Reviews.Author: Evelyn Russell
Reviews.Content: Well - we were away in Florida to check on our condo when I received a text from my daughter asking if I trusted her.  The next thing I know I see a picture in my cell phone of this Kindle!!! Well - I couldn't wait to get home and get my hands on it!  It hasn't been very far from me since! Great product!
Reviews.Title: present from my daughter

Reviews.Author: connie
Reviews.Content: Could not imagine not having it now.DON'T know why I waited so long to get one. I love the games you can play on it also.
Reviews.Title: best

Reviews.Author: Tavarie Becker
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it! Does basically everything an iPod does, but it was way more affordable! This is a great purchase for any college student!
Reviews.Title: amazing!

Reviews.Author: chris north
Reviews.Content: Display and refresh are great!  Fast, compact and light. Text books at my finger tips and games for the kids. Can't beat the deal with Amazon!!!!!
Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Author: Nancy Cahillane
Reviews.Content: I am an avid reader and always said I wouldn't get a Kindle because I like to goto my local library. I received one for Christmas and couldn't be happier. Now Iwill go to the library and read my Kindle!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire!!!

Reviews.Author: Michael Wise
Reviews.Content: Great picture, sound, operating system, Freetime is perfect, and miracast is SO cool! This is by far my best experience with a tablet.
Reviews.Title: Kindle wins

Reviews.Author: Mimi Weitz "Avid Reader"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is possibly the easiest reader to use, has the best resolution I have seen in a long time and the fact that I can get online help immediately is a big plus.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 7

Reviews.Author: stephen malyn
Reviews.Content: Great tab, but until the Flash issue is solved, not perfect. I know they are working on it , but not fixed yet.
Reviews.Title: Web cripple

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It is so easy to run and does so many things.' I seem to learn something new each time I use it.
Reviews.Title: It's Great

Reviews.Author: Shawn Muder
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet.  I thought my first gen Kindle Fire was good, but this one makes it look like an abacus.  So far, I have had little problems with the Kindle.  Only issue is a little screen flicker when reading a book which was significantly reduced when I turned auto-brightness back on.  I love the sharp screen, the X-ray bonus features from IMDB is also nice, since when watching a show or movie I often wonder who is playing who, especially when it's not a main character.  The improved 'carousel' and apps screen is also a nice improvement.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 7 is awesome

Reviews.Author: Katgirl2
Reviews.Content: I used my Kindle Fire for 2 years before getting my Kindle Fire HDX.  I always loved my 'regular' Kindle, but love the HDX even ,ore! It loads much faster, is more clear and has more GBs than the older model.  I can now take pics and store/edit/save them - I didn't realize how much of a difference that makes to me (even if I can only take the pics from the front of the Kindle with this model).  It was super easy to transfer the books that I had purchased from one device to the other. . . I was happily surprised.I do not like the one and only cover option for this newer tablet.  I have knocked it off a few times, as it is only 'held' on by magnets (it IS nice that it folds into a stand, though).  I am not taking any stars off of my rating because of the cover.I would buy another one in a heartbeat, if needed - it is that nice.
Reviews.Title: I had a Kindle Fire before

Reviews.Author: Pamela Ley
Reviews.Content: I am loving my new Kindle HDX.  I got it for Christmas and have read more books since getting it than I've read in a year.  They're much cheaper and accessible.  Plus I can read in bed while my husband sleeps since I don't need to have a light on anymore.  I can get on the Internet quickly and don't have to drag around my big laptop.  It's also convenient for checking my email.  The only draw back is that the camera lens is on the front (facing you) so the only thing you can really do is take selfies, which I DON'T do.  But it does take great pictures as long as you can aim the lens just right.  Other than that it's great!!
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Cheri
Reviews.Content: I love the smaller size (same size as my older Kindle). I can easily take it wherever I go. Lot of free apps (Facebook, email, games; skype, movies and TV shows, Netflix, the web, Amazon shopping, and many more). I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX 7"!!!  Cheryl Metz
Reviews.Title: I love my little computer!

Reviews.Author: Janet P Brown
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle! Ease of downloading, perfect size and weight. Great for reading books and listening to music. Also great value for the price.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: Compared to a nexus 7 which is the same price, the HDX seems to have a slower processor.  It's not as snappy as I would like it to be.  Kindle has a proprietary App Store.  Some apps I really enjoy on my android nexus 5 I can't get on the HDX without sideloading.  I don't feel like I should have side load.  The HDX has a front facing camera, but lacks a rear facing camera.  All in all it's okay, but I feel I could have done better with my 200 bucks by getting a nexus 7.
Reviews.Title: It's Okay

Reviews.Author: Finnan
Reviews.Content: Awesome awesome really awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome totally awesome really cool so awesome it's really impressive and amazing you should get it
Reviews.Title: HDX

Reviews.Author: roz h.
Reviews.Content: I give my new Kindle HDX a 5 star rating because I love it. It is easy to use. The color is great. It gives ease of access to the internet and Wi-Fi usage. My only complaint is that book print is not as large as my old Kindle. I received it as a gift and have used it since the first day.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7"

Reviews.Author: Donna E. Redmond
Reviews.Content: I like it because it is very versatile for my needs. It is very clear in its picture quality. Thanks!
Reviews.Title: It has been an exception purchase

Reviews.Author: bloop
Reviews.Content: My roommates iPad air really isn't that much better.  For the price I would pick this one even though my laptop is a Mac.
Reviews.Title: Great for price!

Reviews.Author: Dennis Moyer Jr
Reviews.Content: would have liked it better if it had a camera  that faced forward,and I thought it was suppose to be clearer
Reviews.Title: it is hard to take pictures

Reviews.Author: j mann
Reviews.Content: I originally had a Kindle Fire which I loved!  This Fire HDX... not so much.  For one,  the reading screen is difficult.  The black of words just seems to fade into background.  I can't seem to get a comfortable reading screen.  Since receiving this at Christmas, I have not read at all on this device; I have only done emails, the web and games.  Reading screen hurts my eyes.  The other major issue is the screen continually freezes.  That happened only occasionally with the Fire.  With those issues in mind, I cannot give this device a 4 or 5 star rating.  I did a lot of research before I chose this particular Kindle.  I remember reading about the reading screen but thought it couldn't be that bad since the Kindle Fire was so adjustable.  Not this one!
Reviews.Title: Looks great...but

Reviews.Author: Peggy S. Ross
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed to find that I cannot play pet rescue saga on my kindle! It is a "King" game, as is the candy crush game, so I'm not understanding why you can get one and not the other! I love reading my books and using it for email,  Facebook, etc
Reviews.Title: where is my game??

Reviews.Author: Deanna Hess
Reviews.Content: I am just getting to use it after the hustle and bustle of the season.  I am disappointed the camera  is only one way.  I would not have purchased it if I had known this.  Otherwise, I do like it alot.
Reviews.Title: The Kindle is a fantastic storybook

Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle was great but this one is greater!! The display is crisp and clear and I don't think its bigger but it sure feels like it! It's easy to use and my favorite feature is the volume control button - much easier than trying to get to the slider on the screen, it's an actual upgrade. My only problem is keeping my husband from "borrowing" it like he did the first (which is now his) one!! If you're ready for an upgrade this is it!
Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it!

Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: Excellent graphics, print quality.  Mayday feature is incredible.  Lightweight compared top Apple products.Downside....battery life is about six hours of  use, not the 11 as advertised.  Haven't tried the book reading yet, which is supposed to be 17.  If the battery life is only 11 with the wifi off, not on the note rent, that should be explained.  Much of the use so far has been for downloaded games, but the wifi is still on.  Maybe something is wrong with the battery, but annoying to have to charge so often.  Reset the sleep time to one minute.  Doesn't seem to make a lot of difference.Overall, other than the battery life, really cool device
Reviews.Title: Kindle hdx

Reviews.Author: Roger VanGordon
Reviews.Content: The color and clarity of the HDX is pretty amazing. Processing speed is far beyond any device I have used to date and works pretty much as advertised. Not fond of there only being a forward facing camera. Not into selfies. I liked the Kindle Touch better for reading in normal light but is nice to be able to read in a lower light with the HDX. Blue outline while reading is not an issue for me just have a difficulty in the back-lit screen, but sure I will become accustomed in time. Over all it is a great device am glad I bought it. Angled power, micro USB, port is taking some practice as well as finding power button. Also battery life is much shorter than I would like though it is probably as good as any other tablet or perhaps better.I would recommend this device to my friends.
Reviews.Title: From Kindle Touch user

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great device. I use it for reading, notes, and games. It is not as fast as my old iPad but for the cost difference it is not a bad trade of. It is not as heavy as my iPad. It fits in my purse do I can read wherever I go. The only thing that disappoints is the camera. I wish it had a rear facing camera so that I could take pictures.
Reviews.Title: Great device

Reviews.Author: Rebecca Beckley
Reviews.Content: For one thing, I have Netflix on my smart phone and it has a wide variety of movies on it...but when I go to watch them on my kindle...the same choice movies are not offered.
Reviews.Title: improve some of the apps available

Reviews.Author: BARBARA LEAVY
Reviews.Content: One of the reasons I upgraded to the Kindle Fire was to have the ability to check my email without going to my computer. So far the 'Mayday' folks and the developers have not been able to resolve the connection problem that appears to be on their end according to the head of my IT department. Major disappointment.
Reviews.Title: Email not working

Reviews.Author: Mark R. Crist
Reviews.Content: The only thing I wish the Kindle Fire had was a USB port for a jump drive. Otherwise I love it!
Reviews.Title: Just one thing

Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: I really love this Kindle Fire HDX 7".  The colors are sharp.  The Kindle is easy to use.  The only thing I don't like about this Kindle Fire is that it needs to be recharge 4 times more than my first Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: LeahB
Reviews.Content: For the price and what I needed it for, it's perfect. Someday, when my schooling is done, ill get back to pleasure reading. And I am sure it will be perfect for that too! Currently I use it in the work I do, (EMS) it is used for documentation and in my classroom activities. LOVE IT! Money well spent. I only wished it had a jump drive, but I was well aware it didn't when I purchased it.
Reviews.Title: love it!

Reviews.Author: John Kovach
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a reader for books when I travel.  What I got was a full function tablet that is easy to use, light with an incredible display.  This device is far more than I expected.  I am incredibly happy with my Kindle Fire HDX and use is much more than I had expected to.
Reviews.Title: Far more than a reader

Reviews.Author: P. A. Lewis
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 7" does everything an iPad does, but cheaper.  I really do like the bright sharpness of the Kindle.  I love it!!
Reviews.Title: Love IT!

Reviews.Author: Rick Scherer
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the larger screen. It's nice to have the speech recognition ability also, just found that. Much easier to use than a laptop. I'm really enjoying my new kindle.
Reviews.Title: I'm really enjoying my new kindle

Reviews.Author: jujamsamsu
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle Fire HDX.  The only thing that I would like to see is a larger screen at the same price.  THE FIRE HDX IS DOING EVERYTHING THAT WE WERE TOLD THAT IT WOULD.  I really like the help button.  It's great that you can see who you are talking to. Keep up the great work Amazon.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX my favorite toy

Reviews.Author: JML in Jersey
Reviews.Content: My kids each have one and they love it!  GREAT for soooo many reasons!  They love it for reading, games, taking pictures, etc.!My husband also has one and LOVES it as well for same reasons stated and so much more!I think it is affordable and so worth it!
Reviews.Title: 3 Kindles in this house!!!

Reviews.Author: Jennifer m
Reviews.Content: I got these for my kids and they love them..the picture is very clear and the tablet is very light..there is lots of storage for videos, music, apps etc..my main gripe is that you can only use the amazon appstore..it is not compatible with google play or itunes which is huge disadvantage because there are a lot of games that are only available through google play. my daughter really wanted the furby boom app for her furby and we found out later it was only available through google play..
Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 7"

Reviews.Author: diamond-flower
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX...it was a birthday gift from my son. I am still learning the ins and outs. There is so much you can do on it. It's so much fun, and I am discovering alot more things I can do with it. Thank you, it's one of my best gifts ever. I couldnt be happier.
Reviews.Title: Awesome!

Reviews.Author: Abbie  Stiffler
Reviews.Content: Love this Kindle with so many applications available at Amazon. I am amazed at how fast it processes data. It is a very good buy being cheaper than an IPad.
Reviews.Title: Great buy!

Reviews.Author: Russell Ankele
Reviews.Content: Not very happy with the Kindle Fire HDX 4G. After signing up for 3 gb of data from AT&T; the kindle kept saying "invalid sim" at the top. After talking to amazon customer support (who is very easy to get ahold of) I had to take it to AT&T; for a replacement sim. That did not fix the problem. Amazon did send a new one 2 day shipping. So everything should be good, but no. The new kindle will still go offline here and there saying invalid sim. Since I bought it for my girlfriend and she says she can live with it, I'm not going to go though the trouble of having to return it again. Also since I was unable to use it until the replacement came and the data connect 30 day period had started, it seems like I lost about 10% of my planned data period. All in all my girlfriend is happy with the Kindle Fire HDX, but I will be purchasing an iPad for myself.
Reviews.Title: Not happy

Reviews.Author: Betty H Holden
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire HDX 7" for Christmas.  I have really enjoyed it much more than I ever thought that I would.  When you need help on your Kindle, the support is simply wonderful.  I would highly recommend this to anyone.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M.
Reviews.Content: This my first tablet and my wife has a Samsung, and I have to say, my kindle is faster and has a better battery life and if that was not enough, mine was cheaper by about $60 dollars. So buy with confidence. The kindle has come a long way from the first one. Which my daughter has, so mine is leaps and bounds better then hers. You will not be disappointed. Enjoy and keep up the great products kindle.and no they are not paying me to say this.
Reviews.Title: i have a kindle hdx

Reviews.Author: Angelina Urena
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's so easy to use. No looking up the manual, just turn it on and go! The colors are vibrant the sound amazing and thousands of books and apps to choose from.
Reviews.Title: I love my kindle!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like it.  I haven't used it for everything that I could be using it to do but so far so good.  I have to get used to it.  I haven't read any books on it as I'm still using my old Kindle for that.
Reviews.Title: Wonderful

Reviews.Author: mmk
Reviews.Content: When I bordered the Kindle Fire HDX,  I was using a desktop computer, a laptop, a Kindle Paperwhite, and an Android tablet. It was time to simplify me electronic life. And this has done it all. I love this device. It's sleek, light, fast, clear easy to use, and I have no regrets.
Reviews.Title: Wonderful!

Reviews.Author: Drastic
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this device because of the specs and the large amount of hype it received Upon using the device it had unprecedented slow-downs/freezups. I tried reloading it and the issue remained. The other issue I was receiving was sometimes the battery life would be great other times it would die in less than 3 hours from a full charge and no use. Note that this would occur regardless of apps running or not. I think my device was faulty so I returned it for a refund.However I can say the following things :The app selection is not great and typically very expensive in-app purchases. The only thing that has a reasonable price tag is Amazons own content ( books etc. )All in all it felt well build and the sound and screen where great.Not recommended for someone looking for a stock android device.
Reviews.Title: Didn't seem to work very well.

Reviews.Author: Deborah Hanson
Reviews.Content: I just love love love it. I got it for Christmas . It is all and more than I hoped it would be. I am an no means a computer person, but it was so easy to navigate. The graphics are terrific. So clear even for a little screen.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: KatKat
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with my Kindle, the only thing is that it turns off sometimes and it bugs me.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Janiece
Reviews.Content: This replaced my Kindle Fire HD which I gave to my daughter.  While the tablet is as described and is great, the battery life is HORRIBLE!
Reviews.Title: Replaced Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Author: Charles Marion "C S Marion"
Reviews.Content: very limited apps and functionality. I was expecting something that would at least run android apps. the screen is absolutely amazing though and as a media viewer can't be beat.  I would give it 4.5 starz if they would just tell you what apps work or not before you buy and install them.
Reviews.Title: a bit disappointed

Reviews.Author: Kathryn Frederick
Reviews.Content: A guide sh/have come with it.  Trying to figure out everything myself if straining.  Im lost on most occasions.  If I cld look at a guide, I cld work from there.
Reviews.Title: need a guide

Reviews.Author: LDo
Reviews.Content: Often blank screenwhen I want to shop for books and help is not helpful if scrren is blank No better than nook
Reviews.Title: Stalls too often!

Reviews.Author: Darlene Farley
Reviews.Content: Simple to use and quick tech support. Great size and storage, added camera is nice if your into facetime or Skype but not for taking an actual picture of something! It freezes often and won't load when connected to the web, I always have to disconnect the WiFi and wait a few seconds and then reconnect the WiFi to correct loading issue. This is my second kindle, first one stopped charging because the port became loose. If your kindle needs repair good luck finding an affordable repair place! It was almost cheaper to just by a replacement kindle.
Reviews.Title: getting better but not the best...

Reviews.Author: Dolores Hannum
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. Never thought I needed one. Did not want anymore electronics to keep charging. BUT I find I was wrong. I LOVE my Kindle Fire!!!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Author: Karen Nigbor
Reviews.Content: She Loves the KindleHDX and my Husband wants one for himself. We still need to purchase a case and screen protection but haven't had any real problems playing the KindleHDX. It has a crystal clear picture and the sound on it is Awesome too.  Thank you for this wonderful creation.
Reviews.Title: Santa brought this for my Daughter

Reviews.Author: Terrie Franklin
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle.  There are so many more things I can do with it that I could not do with my basic Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Mike J Sulik
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX, I can do everything on it Including buying books at very low prices, I take it everywhere I go,one of the coolest things is being able to talk to someone live if I have any questions, and I use that feature alot, lol. I absolutely recommend this Kiddle, you will love  it!!!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Pablo Martinez
Reviews.Content: I didn't like the camera function. I can't take pictures the way it's design. Overall the I'm satisfied with my kindle. My wife loves it!
Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Author: Deborah A. Blood
Reviews.Content: I loved my old monochrome Kindle and I still do, and I was very hesitant to upgrade to the Kindle Fire. It was a Christmas gift and, frankly, I was less than thrilled at first. Now I love it! Email, internet, and all my favorite books all on one device - FABULOUS!
Reviews.Title: I wasn't thrilled about upgrading...

Reviews.Author: Sally Williams
Reviews.Content: Love it. If I need to know something about the Kindle there's someone right there to help me find out how to get the results.
Reviews.Title: why I love the KIndle FIre

Reviews.Author: Randall Eastes
Reviews.Content: Got mine for Christmas. I love it. The size is just right and the connectivity is great for my needs. I highly recommend it...
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Charlie stout
Reviews.Content: Ease of use.  Improvements are as follows .  be able to upgrade. no hdmi port. no back camera. back camera would be biggest improvement
Reviews.Title: Good and bad

Reviews.Author: Loretta Lurer
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Recently had a stay in hospital and my son gave me my Kindle Fire to help pass the time and also access my netflix account.
Reviews.Title: saved the day during hospital stay

Reviews.Author: Mitzi Means
Reviews.Content: Got Kindle Fire HDX AS a gift for myself for Christmas. Not knowing anything about tablets and am not a "techy", I was unsure but decided to give it a try. Got it home and MAN it was so easy to use, easy to navigate and is lightening fast, plus it hold a good battery charge. I would highly recommend this tablet. NO REGRETS.
Reviews.Title: The best tablet ever!!

Reviews.Author: Judy Jakob
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I got a Tablet last year for Christmas (2012), and I don't even use that anymore. The Kindle is so much easier to use. It also have more free games to download. And I enjoy the hundred free books app.My son also uses it when I let him.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: dustin
Reviews.Content: I bought the HDX so that I could possibly use the features of Amazon Prime, and the front facing camera for my time spent in Thailand. Amazon Prime streaming will not work in Thailand, and to use the photos or video taken with the device, you have to link the device to your Facebook, and sign away all rights to privacy for you and anyone on your friends list. I refuse to sell out all my friends and family just so I can post a video message. So now I am in Thailand with only a device that I can simply browse the web with and check my messages. I will immediately get rid of the device when I am back in the states and buy an IPad.
Reviews.Title: useless outside of the united states.

Reviews.Author: isamara cotto
Reviews.Content: It's awesome I can use it for everything and anything. It's very practical and fun. I recommend it to everyone and anyone. Including kids
Reviews.Title: i love it

Reviews.Author: Samuel Smith
Reviews.Content: I loved it until I got a blue screen twice in less than 15 min and lost all my data for a game I had almost finished.  Amazon's mayday person apologized that I lost data but said there was nothing he could do and had never personally heard about a blue screen but in the next breath said he had when I said other people online said to hold power button for 20 seconds when get blue screen.  I am really disappointed. It was a Christmas present.
Reviews.Title: Disappointed. Got blue screen & lost data

Reviews.Author: S.Martin
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 7 is great. I love it. The price is right, it's so easy to use, light weight, movie watching is fantastic and Amazon has so many wonderful apps! It's perfect.
Reviews.Title: On Fire for Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Author: Linda Genevie
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first kindle about 4 years ago and loved it.  When the Kindle Fire came out I was a little afraid of the technology.  My son bought it for me for Christmas and it is so easy to use.  I never leave home without it.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Kc
Reviews.Content: Low battery life. Does not work with sites that requires flash player. Every time I turn the tablet on I get  advertising. Cannot turn it off.
Reviews.Title: get what you pay for

Reviews.Author: Cristen
Reviews.Content: this is great for kids to learn and have fun. easy to navigate.can keep an eye on what they select.also teaches them to only buy what is necessary
Reviews.Title: great keeps child busy

Reviews.Author: Andrew Swartzmiller
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is great for Netflix and Amazon prime. The picture quality is absurd. The only downfall is no Google play store access.
Reviews.Title: Best for binge watching HD TV and movies

Reviews.Author: sandra k neveadomis
Reviews.Content: I also am happy that the battery lasts a bit longer then the kindle fire. I haven't tried watching a movie as yet but I like that option.
Reviews.Title: I now have 3 kindles!! This is the best because of the mayday button I love that feature.

Reviews.Author: Brian Weeks
Reviews.Content: I Love this thing.  My only complaint would be the fact that I can't play some adobe supported videos and some YouTube videos.  Other than, it is amazing!  Display mirroring is really cool.
Reviews.Title: Outstanding!

Reviews.Author: vintage-attic
Reviews.Content: Awesome resolutionMay day is worth its weight in goldEasy to learnGreat free appsVery light and easy to holdFor a first time user it can't be beatBattery doesn't last long enoughNo directions on unitOverall best buy
Reviews.Title: grab one quick!

Reviews.Author: Mary M. Bilson
Reviews.Content: The graphics are bright, and clear.  Easy to use and manuever around the internet.  Great for reading, and playing games.  Has decent sound quality for easy music listening.  This is my second Kindle Fire.  My first one was 1st generation.  Moving up and if Kindle continues to keep up like this I would get another one in a couple of years.  Love my Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Easy to use

Reviews.Author: packfan1Montana
Reviews.Content: Excellent speed fast internet easy to use I don't even use my computer much any more its portable  just love it
Reviews.Title: love my Kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Wildwood
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift.  I'm really enjoying using it.  I find I read far more and enjoy reading even more. It certainly does everything I would use a tablet/reader for and with the wireless keyboard I purchased separately-its perfect.
Reviews.Title: So fun!

Reviews.Author: Mary Bosworth

Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: I received a Kindle HDX for a Christmas present and absolutely LOVE IT! It can do so many more things than I thought it would. My children love to play games on it and it is easy for them to navigate. I read books on it while working out and use it to read bedtime stories to my children for bedtime. It is now my go-to electronic for all my social network needs and for leisure reading. I was reluctant to go this route for books as I am a big time reader and was stuck on wanting a paperback in my hands... I was wrong, I will most likely never go back to traditional books. It keeps your place every time and so easy to read! I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Roger Turner, L.
Reviews.Content: First, I am a new user of the HDX - I expect, after I become more knowledgeable about the device, my rating will improve. One of the first things I tried to do was download the User Guide - so far, I have been unsuccessful - it has simply taken too long and it times-out. It seems reasonable that there should be an easier (faster) way.  While I am computer "literate", it has been slow finding my way around all that the HDX offers.One of the reasons I selected the HDX was the availability of the Skype App.  When I installed it, however, Skype advised that they were blocking my account - because of a break-in that occurred in 2010. Everything was resolved by Skype and my bank, and I have been using Skype on my desktop ever since.  Working with Skype to unblock my account was endlessly frustrating.A minor point. I have used Every Word: Crossing on a previous Kindle.  I expected to use it on the HDX. However, after searching the Kindle website, I finally determined it was not compatible with the HDX. Subsequently, I purchase (it was free) the App Every Word - and received confirmation.  However, it was never delivered.  Your helpful tech determined that (again) it was not compatible with the HDX.  Not a crises - just a bit irritating.I have not yet used the Amazon Assist feature yet - but I think the offering is excellent.In one of the reviews I read before selecting the HDX, the reviewer commented that the On/Off button was in an awkward place - I agree.Thank you for the opportunity to comment.
Reviews.Title: My Comment

Reviews.Author: murray johnson
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to give a little praise to the Mayday people. Called them at 0430 hrs, CST , on 28 Jan. They came on line quickly, were very polite and knew exactly what to do about my problem. I only wish I could remember the young lady's name that was so helpful. I was back up and running within 5 minutes. Excellent job people. I have the technical abilities of a toad and she patiently stayed with  me until I got. By the way I own 3 of the Fire, 2 of the HDX's. Thanks for the help.

Reviews.Title: beautiful

Reviews.Content: I can do anything on it, I get to check email, check Facebook and enjoy shopping. The camera is awesome... I love my Kindle Fire HDX...
Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet

Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: First of all I'd like to say this product was bought for my mother for Christmas/Birthday since they were only a few weeks apart. I didn't need a high end laptop or a desktop with an i7 processor or any kind of powerhouse. I just needed something with good processing power, an HD display, and something simple so that my mother could browse the web and watch Netflix or something. The product came with the standard usb/wall charger and nothing more, but you don't need anything else. After registering the device it was good to go. The quality is superb, transitioning between apps and things are easy and fluid, and it even has a headphone jack so you can hear media in peace or without disturbing others. The only thing my mother wanted, though, was to play Papa Pear Saga and it isn't compatible with the Kindle Fire.All in all this product was more than enough for my mother. She was happy with the product and I was happy to see my mother happy. The only thing I didn't like, which has nothing to do with the product itself, was that Amazon had the May-Day $30 off Kindle's sale right after I ordered it so I kinda missed out on a greater deal. I'd recommend this to anyone who just plans to browse the web, check Facebook, watch YouTube or Netflix, or something like Skype.

I'm pretty much contemplating going back to my 1st generation fire...

Reviews.Content: The fact that you cannot customize anything is annoying beyond belief and there's and advertisement every time you turn it on or in lock it is ridiculous no I don't want to buy a dirt devil thank you. Other than that it's pretty decent could have a better camera and a back facing one ...I did return it for a galaxy tablet that I am much more happy with.
Reviews.Title: eh .

Reviews.Author: jeff brownstein
Reviews.Content: This is the first review I have ever written for any product that I have ever purchased. It will be brief.  I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX "7"This is the journey I took before I settled on my HDX "7".Purchased Barnes And Noble HD 9.0. Returned it. Purchased Google Nexus 7 Second Generation. Returned it  Purchased Samsung Note 8 for an amazing $225 from Staples because of coupons and store discounts. No rebates to wait for. It was an incredible deal. Returned it. Purchased apple mini with retina display for $399. Returned it. Purchased Kiindle Fire HDX 8.9. returned it.The HDX "7" and HDX "8.9" are both amazing. I settled on the "7" because I bought it from BEST BUY for $239. The HDX "8.9" was $429 for the 32 gig unit. Four things. The Display color is awesome! The display screen resolution is incredibly sharp and the "READING VIEW" is a true joy when I'm reading digital media such as CNN and MSN. ( Reading View feature is only available on certain websites so  it's not on all the websites I browse but it's a fantastic feature to have!!) The audio is wonderful. I also am very impressed with the "MAYDAY" feature which connects you with a live technical advisor in 15 seconds by simply clicking on "MAYDAY". I can think of a few times when I wasn't and home received help instantly. The "MAYDAY" Tech. drew red circles on my screen so I could see what he was doing and fixed my problem remotely. I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX "7"!!!!

Reviews.Content: just love my tablet.  graphics are clear and load times are excellent.  it is easy to handle and scrolls better than a mouse would on a desk top.  it also travels well; tuck mine in my planner and have everything I need.the only negative is that sometimes bringing my hand close to the screen will trigger a response.  however, a very sensitive screen is not a nuisance, just an ability that needs refining.the audio was also surprisingly good for a small device.  picture quality and battery life were much better than expected.  overall, Santa was very good to me.jose'

Reviews.Title: Perfect for reading Kobo E-books

Reviews.Author: Book Lover
Reviews.Content: 1. Despite the apparent clarity of the display, I get eyestrain using it much sooner than with the Paperwhite, 2. the OS is corruptible (probably caused by the attempted auto-update of an app I downloaded from the Amazon Kindlefire hdx "store" - I had to do a factory reset when despite excellent Wifi connection, I couldn't communicate with any on-line sites one morning, despite being able to do so for a week after installing that app, 3. the on/off/hibernate button is on the bottom - which is a pain when you're using a cover or case that fold back behind the device - what was so bad about having the button on the front of the frame?, 4.The hurdles Amazon has erected to deny access to the fully compatible apps in the Google apps "store" seems petty.  The web is full of detailed instructions how to circumvent the issue.  I bought the device primarily as an e-reader that has much enhanced internet connectivity compared with the Paperwhite.  As an e-reader I much prefer the Paperwhite.  As an internet device for web browsing and e-mail use, the Kindle Fire HDX is much better than the Paperwhite.  Now if the engineers could incorporate both types of display into one screen and have it automatically switch from one to the other depending on the task being performed - THAT would be a great device!

If it weren't a gift, I would have rooted it and installed a different version of Android.  Also, the edge bleed on the screen is pretty bad.  I regret buying this over a cheaper Nexus.

The Kindle Fire HDX does surfing just fine, but as far as I am concerned it blows the iPad away when it comes to making reading books and magazines comfortable.I was a little worried about  "Special Offers" but they barely even get in the way.So impressed!

Reviews.Content: I own an iPad 10inch. I wanted a smaller tablet but did not want to spend all that money ona iPad mini. I have a co-worker who has a Kindle HDX 7 and she loves hers so I decided to get one myself and so I'm so glad I did. I love that it's a size of a book n it works absolutely great. I love amazon n I'm a prime member. I love to read books n the Kindle fire it's so easy to carry around. I love that there are lots of movies you can download n watch without wifi. So if you go on a trip you can down load some movies or tv shows n watch them anywhere. The kindle fire has a clear beautiful screen. It's great to play games n also it has two speakers n that makes a difference. some people say that the speakers are not that loud. I have an iPad with one speaker n the Kindle sounds a lot better. I also like the special offers, it's nice to see what deals are going on. They only appear when you wake up the Kindle. Once you swipe to activate the Kindle there is no interruption with the special offers. I'm really enjoying the Kindle fire hdx. I'm not disappointed at all. I like it more than my iPad. I purchased the 32gb. More than enough for me. I think it's a great buy n I would recommend the Kindle hdx. Hope this helps.
