Reviews.Title: Beat my expectations

Reviews.Author: Nicholas J Littier
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at tablets for a while, and for Christmas this year I received the HDX 7" as a gift, but I finally made my mind up to return it in favor of another tablet.On the positive side, the hardware on the HDX is really impressive.  The processing speed and memory are among the best for 7" tablets.  The screen is fantastic, and even the sound from the speakers is impressive.  Another great feature is the ability to view Prime Instant Video.  Access to free movies and TV shows (some of them are even downloadable for off-line viewing) is an added bonus of having an Amazon Prime subscription.The tablet is also great for kids, or individuals who aren't very tech savvy.  Its very intuitive to use, and the parental controls are fantastic--even allowing parents to set a designated period of time that their kids can play with the device.  If you are a parent, someone who is looking for an easy-to-use device, or someone that simply wants to watch videos, read books, and play simple games, then the HDX might be your tablet.However, I was looking for a more traditional Android experience and I just couldn't get past the Fire's heavily modified Android operating system.  First, the operating system offers very few customization options.  For example, you cannot change the background screen, have access to widgets, or customize/organize your home screen as you would for other Android devices.  I also use the Swiftkey Keyboard on my Android smartphone, which has helped productivity when sending text/email, however, the keyboard on the HDX cannot be changed and Swiftkey is not available for the HDX in the Amazon Appstore.The real nail in the coffin for me was the inability to access Google services.  This means you won't have access to the Google Play store, which has a vastly improved app selection over Amazon's Appstore.  You also cannot access Google Hangouts which I use frequently for text/chat messages as well as video calls and videoconferencing.  Further, I use Google's Chromecast to stream video to my television. The Chromecast app is unavailable on the HDX.The tradeoff of purchasing another Android device over the HDX is the inability to use the Prime Instant Video.  Amazon has provided an Prime Instant Video app for Apple devices, but has not (and I suspect will not) produce one for other Android devices.  I'm not going to lose any sleep over this because I didn't find the selection of free movies and TV to be all that impressive.  The selection of free movies that were downloadable to the device for off-line viewing was even less impressive.  Most of my video viewing on the tablet was through HBO Go, Hulu+, or Netflix.All in all, the HDX is a decent tablet with great hardware that unfortunately stumbles on its software.  If Amazon were to offer a Kindle device with the same hardware, but with a more traditional Android software experience with a slight Amazon spin (a la the Samsung Galaxy Tablets), I would certainly be willing to pay a higher price for the device.

Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I was finally able to pick on these up when Amazon offered a year-long payment option. So far I've had a pretty experience with it. Adding this to a mainly iOS collection was a bit of a struggle at first (still is a bit), with regards to navigating the software and remembering where the buttons on the machine are. Those are obvious initial speed bumps though, and they haven't been that bad. I've been very happy with the sharpness of the screen. Very happy. Movies look great, games look great, photos and games look great. I've burned through three books on this thing and it's been great. The Send To Kindle app is such a neat thing, I've been able to send documents straight from my Mac to the Kindle over wifi, which is so simple and genius. The only thing I haven't figured out quite yet is if the battery always drains as fast, or if there are apps running the background and I'm just not sure how to turn them off completely. It's a simple thing to do on my iPad Mini. Between the Mini and the Kindle I prefer the interface of the Mini, but the size and screen of the Kindle. The Kindle is definitely my go-to for reading now, and the Mini will remain my game/entertainment machine, mostly because the app store is leaps and bounds ahead of anything else. I definitely recommend this to someone who's in the market and doesn't have a tablet of any kind, but I'm unsure if I'd recommend it to someone who already does have one.

Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my wife for Christmas.  It was a pain reading the reviews of all of the different tablets and trying to decide on which one to go with. Add a google prime account to this little guy and you'll be very happy, as we are.  Can't go wrong!  Edit: I got her the Otter Box case, Marware Capacitive Stylus, as well as the rapid charger and she was equally delighted with those as well! Edit2: We have used the mayday button on our kindle twice in order to get a bit of assistance learning the navigation at first, then to get assistance when it froze up one time. Customer service is incredible for many reasons.  First, because the person helping you gets connected immediately, no time waiting on the phone, second they are instantly remoted in and can see and help you live on your screen, third, they offered to replace the kindle at the drop of a hat if it freezes up.  We decided to update the device and keep some background apps closed and see how it goes.  It is a big relief that Amazon is very concerned at keeping us happy with this product.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Content: My husband and I always wait awhile before buying new technology. Wait until all the bugs are worked out and the prices go down. I can't believe how sharp the picture is on this device. It was really easy to hook up to our wi-fi and set up email accounts. Reading is not difficult at all and we have both read an e-book now, one from Amazon Prime and one from the local library. Even websites that are not "responsive" look fine in the landscape view. Sometimes it is a little difficult to tap a link on websites, but I imagine that is true on all tablets. We read news in bed with coffee, and I use it with its new stand in the kitchen to read recipes off the web while I cook. We have even watched a movie from Amazon Prime on it.And that's one of the neatest things about it. We are on satellite, and even though our internet is fast enough to stream video, we have a usage allotment every month we can't go over. But we have a free period between 12 midnight and 5 am. With Amazon Prime, you can download movies to watch later. I believe that feature is only on the Fire HDX. But it looks like it is only true on movies. TV shows seem to be streaming only.I found the interface very intuitive and was working it right away. My husband was a little slower and bought a book for it. But then I picked up a few things I didn't know too. So it is probably a good idea to buy a guide of some sort.

Reviews.Content: I really like the Kindle Fire HD for what it does. I think we have to put all these tablets in perspective. I also have a 8.9" Nook HD+. So, much as been said about the Kindle that I had to buy one to see for myself is it all that it is said to be. I like the Kindle because of its size and portability. One of the main reasons that I can really enjoy my Kindle is because it has been rooted. This means that not only do I have access to Amazon content, I also have access to the Google PlayStore. This is important to me in order to be able to enjoy ownership of a Kindle.With it being rooted I can enjoy both worlds. The Kindle is a fantastic tablet, but in my opinion only if it is rooted. I don't like proprietary software and if you keep it with Amazon's offers, ecosystem it gets really boring quick. I am a Prime and Netflix member, so this tablet is great. I am able to fit it inside my purse and travel with it with no problem. However, the only reason I can enjoy it to this point is because it is rooted. It is a beautiful tablet and I really like everything it can do.Pros: affordability, portability, fast and efficient software (speedy), beautiful display resolution, versatile (if able to root), impressive device (makes me want the 8.9" just can't justify the purchase since I have a Nook of the same size)Cons: no way to expand memory, no HDMI ouptput, proprietary software, having to pay to stop special offers

Reviews.Content: Beautiful display, lightweight, no problems with using it immediately.  The only thing I do not like about is, when reading outside, your face is easier to see than your book!  I spoke with Help, (which is free, instant, and great), and she guided me to change font, etc, which I had already done.  Larger font helped but still got a headache.  I plan to check out Amazon to find filter.All said, GREAT.  So glad I gave myself this Christmas present.

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old. It is better than similar versions of competitors! Very user friendly and has a super clear screen.
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx

Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my Kindle Fire HDX 7".  It is everything I expected it to be and would recommend this item to my family and friends.
Reviews.Title: What I think of the Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: SinCityMel "Amazon Addict"
Reviews.Content: I'm a professional by the day and artist by night.I use my HDX for all the standard applications and enjoy the usual stuff (email, web browsing, shopping on Amazon, etc.)As a crafter, it's great for using a pattern and/or flipping through craft magazines, bookmarking pages, and highlighting tips. I also have saved pdf docs of patterns and tutorials on it. My HDX works beautifully, in the standing case, on my jewelers bench for various metalworking guides and for offline use.In my kitchen, the HDX is  a recipe book,  with recipes from the internet via wifi as well as files saved offline.Basic Pros -- The images & sounds are  crisp and clear,  which is a significant improvement over the original Kindle Fire.- Easy to use & navigate for the slightly less tech savvy (I'm an art geek not a techno geek and comfortable with Apple products.)- Kid friendly, my 2 yr old niece and 8 yr old nephew enjoyed an interactive story on it as well as the usual kid games and apps.- A lot (1000's) of free Kindle books, lower priced reads, samples, and the Prime lending library for a monthly freebie.Basic Cons --My 64gb 7" model doesn't  have  a rear facing camera but it's not enough of a con to knock a star off. I use a DSLR for my art pics and my iPhone 5s for my out-and-about snapshots, so using the HDX for an occasional selfie or web chat is  great.-The battery life isn't as good as it was on the old original Kindle Fire. Since this version does a lot more, it makes sense, and because I charge it daily.  I don't have issues with it dying on me in the middle of activity.- Overall this Amazon addict is pleased! -My  new lightweight Kindle goes everywhere with me. I take notes on it, play games, read magazines and books, and the previously mentioned craft applications. I love it for streaming shows and playing music. It's a great device and IMO (in my opinion) a truly good bang for your buck.

Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle but there are some small problems with it that I feel should have been tested out before Amazon ships them out to customers.I received my Kindle as a Christmas gift from my boyfriend. He gave me the option of a Kindle or an iPad so I choose Kindle because I wanted something different; we have a few Apple products already. Unfortunately when I received the Kindle, there was an issue with the volume buttons on the back. They only worked half of the time. When they did work they were kind of glitchy and the times that they did not work, well, you would push the buttons numerous times and absolutely nothing would happen. So Amazon kindly sent me a replacement. Once again, this Kindle had a problem as well (maybe I have horrible luck?). This time the area that should have displayed AT&T; 4G and the signal bars read "INVALID SIM". It would not work. So I went to AT&T; and got a new sim card and it still did not work. I returned both Kindles and decided to not receive a third.Things I did like about the Kindle: I liked the size. I didn't really want a big tablet so the size of the 7 inch was perfect. I liked the back side of the Kindle. The iPad's back are metal so I see them as being more likely to slip out of your hands but the kindle's back made for a better grip. I like the display. Also, the speakers on the back of the kindle were great! It has a nice surround sound like quality.Things I did not like: the hardware issues.Overall, the Kindle itself was nice but problems with the hardware were not okay. I did not want to keep having replacements shipped to me until I found one that worked 100 percent. I believe that once Amazon does some more work on these devices they will be really great but until then, the Kindle is not the tablet for me.

Reviews.Author: someone
Reviews.Content: There are many reviews for this device, but not much information about how to output the device display content to external TV/monitor. So, I'll share my experience with that part in case it could be useful for someone else looking for that functioanlity.I had this for few weeks, and basically can echo many other reviewers. Excellent build quality, display, Amazon apps. If you're planning to use this device just to shop, read, watch videos on Amazon (on Kindle display) I doubt you could find anything else even close. However, if you want to output the display or sound content to an external device like a TV it all starts to go downhill. I want to highlight these issues since I could not find any details on the web (except very few).For some reason, Amazon does not provide apps such as "Pioneer Control App" and "Panasonic Remote 2". These are essential for me to control my TV and receiver from Kindle, so I could use them as a workaround for at least playing my own music/video library. To make matters worse, there's no other display output (like DLNA, through the home network). Kindle does not have an HDMI port, and the USB port does not work as a "Slim Port". So, I tried the "Kindle Certified" NetgearPush2TV. A real dissapointing experience. I wrote a separate review for that. Apparently Amazon tech support (and Netgear support) does not know much about this (I spoke with at least 4 agenrts, if I remember correctly). All Amazon agents were great, but couldn't help. So, if you plan to use the Kindle for the following then you'll be dissapointed:1. Play music from Kindle to your networked (aka connected) receiver2. Play videos (from internet/Amazon Instant Videos and from your own library) from Kindle to a networked TV3. GPS (e.g. with CoPilot) --- Kindle does not have a GPS, which I realized after buying. My bad, not whining hereA modern high-end device like Kindle should provide this sort of basic functionality, in my opinion. I was surprised to learn these limitations (the hard way). There are apps for this sort of thing (e.g. Flips/iMediaShare) but they're far from perfection with many limitations. I tried very hard to keep the Kindle and find workarounds for the limitations mentioned above but I could not. So I had to return it.Since then I bought a Nexus 7. Only problem I have is that Amazon does not allow it to access Instant videos (I knew this before I bought it but still weird, because I can use any other device and don't see how Amazon makes money by blocking it. Kindle is really cheap, so, also hard to understand how they make lot of money by selling the hardware. So, I'm confused but there must be some reason other than just Amazon/Google rivarly). I don't watch videos very often (but my son takes care of that for me with his Kindle) so it's not a huge isue for me at this point.Again, you need to read this review very carefully since I did not attempt to highlight lot of good aspects of the device since others have already mentioned those; if the extra networking/navigation/output functionality is not needed for you then the Kindle is an excellent device.
Reviews.Title: Great device but lacking output/apps for external devices (TV, Receiver)

Reviews.Author: Christine Hill
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I've ever owned so I can't really compare it to anything else out there on the market but I am enjoying my Kindle a lot. There is no way I could afford a new iPad and after using this, I don't think I would want one anyway. I use this primarily for reading, watching videos and movies, and occasionally surfing the web, so nothing terribly extensive. It suits my needs just fine, at a lower price point and makes me feel like getting an iPad would just be overkill for me. I purchased mine with the adds included and honestly it's not a big deal. They're not intrusive with whatever I might be doing on the tablet and if it bothered me that much I would just pay the $15 to have them removed. There are some deals that are exclusive to kindle fire owners which is pretty awesome and since I use amazon quite often for purchases, I don't mind a chance at snagging a good deal. There are plenty of apps to pick from (for my purposes anyway) like Facebook, Youtube, and a few games here or there. It's lightweight and easy to hold for reading while lounging around in bed and the movies I've watch show up in beautiful quality. I would definitely recommend a kindle tablet to anyone who is looking for a tablet for entertainment purposes but is hesitant to shell out the cash for one of the more expensive brands. Overall I am very happy with this purchase.

I started with a kindle (3rd gen), then kept upgrading like a tech junkie every time a new one came out...after reading reviews on the HDX online, st first I was a little worried about the "purple haze" issue everyone mentioned. But, after watching a YouTube video showcasing the actual performance of the tablet,I decided that little issue want enough to dissuade me, so  my husband went ahead and got it for me for Christmas. Once again, I think the performance of the kindle fire HDX outweighs that of the iPad on pretty much every front: display, processing speed, features ( I have no desire to use my tablet as a camera, so for those who would vote that as a deal breaker, it was moot for me). I love all the features, and even tho I have not yet used the Mayday feature, I think that is a great addition as well...no need to make an appointment to speak to a"genius"...mine lives in my device!! Once again, kindle delivered.  I am a kindle user for life!
Reviews.Title: Kindle # 4...

Reviews.Author: Doneit "Doneit"
Reviews.Content: Picture is exquisite and the sound is fantastic.Bought this one as a replacement for my previous 7" [my puppy got a hold of it].I loved the one I had, but this one definitely takes it up a notch.Highly recommend it.
Reviews.Title: Love the new HDX kindle!!!!

Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: Bought my first Kindle Fire two years ago.  My husband suggested I get a new Fire HDX this year.  Can't tell you how much I love the new HDX, but still use my old one too, just can't seem to let it go. Love this product and I am sure there are more in my future.
Reviews.Title: My Second Kindle - Love It

Reviews.Author: Edward Rose
Reviews.Content: This was a great gift to give my wife she loves it. Maybe she  wont go blind looking at her cell phone.
Reviews.Title: Gift

Reviews.Author: Lisa Lovett
Reviews.Content: I love this little machine! It can do it all!  Love the clarity of the screen. I bought this as a gift for my husband. Now I want one for myself.
Reviews.Title: Love this tablet!

Reviews.Author: Thomas Textor "Sail Daddy"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle has a beautiful display and the addition of selected Apps make it comparable to many tablets as well. The size is small enough for a reader, but still large enough for personal viewing of videos and other applications as well.
Reviews.Title: Beautiful and functional!

Reviews.Author: blueyz132000 "Kay"
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle Fire...wish I could have afforded the 8.5" but I do love it and the feature.  Still learning all the tricks.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: Mike Thorn
Reviews.Content: I never owned a tablet before but decided to give Amazon a shot with there Kindle line up after reading a lot of positive reviews and I couldn't be happier. The tablet itself is very quick, the graphics are great, the whole tablet experience with books, music, video games, apps etc.. is just well rounded and easy to use. I personally haven't bought or picked up a book to read in years and within days of owning this I decided to download a book and now I'm back in the game reading books! Can't say nothing negative about this tablet so far it just seems like Amazon put there time into building this and it shows!
Reviews.Title: Awsome Tablet!

Reviews.Author: Janet H
Reviews.Content: So far I've had no problems with my Kindle. I was foolish enough to buy a nook a few years back and learned from that experience to never do that again. Kindle is just what I wanted in what I would call a small tablet.
Reviews.Title: Very happy customer.

Reviews.Author: Venus
Reviews.Content: Awesome tablet! Awesome price! Awesome High Definition! Thank you Amazon for making this awesome tablet! My son who is 13 loves this tablet! My daughter who is 9 has the kindle fire 2nd generation from last year's Christmas presents and she loved that! but she really loves her brother's HDX! Perfect for my kids! Since they both love to read, watch movies, play games and research their homework!  Plus great customer service!
Reviews.Title: Awesome! Awesome! and Awesome!

Reviews.Author: shane foley
Reviews.Content: It's great in every way. The screen is so sharp, mayday is very helpful. Can't think of anything bad about it.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx

Reviews.Author: Nora J.Goodson
Reviews.Content: this was bought for grandson and dang I am jealous. I have the reg kindle fire and what this one can do is amazing and my daughter can keep her stuff separate from the kid zone that he is locked in so no purchases or places he shouldnt be this is well worth the purchase
Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Author: Wealthygirl
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 7!  Already tried the May Day feature and service was excellent!  Vivid color and excellent audio features. Would recommend this product to anyone considering making this purchase.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7

Reviews.Author: MamabearArndt
Reviews.Content: I received my new Kindle Fire HDX 7" on Christmas Eve as a gift to myself.  I had spend the last three months trying to decide between the Kindle and the new iPad Mini retina display.  At first I thought I might have made a big mistake choosing the Kindle mainly for the $275 savings over the iPad for the 64GB WiFi only model. I have had a iPhone for 4 years and have become very accustom to the functionality of the Apple products.  It took me only 24 hours to discover how to navigate the Kindle.  And I LOVE it.All of that being said there is 1 thing I wish Kindle would chance.  Kindle does not have "podcasts" for download.  Some of my favorite news podcasts are not available on Kindle at all and what is available can not be downloaded ONLY viewed through streaming which only works when I am on WiFi.  This limits when I can view these programs.
Reviews.Title: Loving my new Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Dr C
Reviews.Content: ... tho' I'm still getting friendly w/ it. I can easily recommend this product - it's a perfect size and having  the 'Ask me' or whatever they call it feature is terrific. Would definitely buy this again.
Reviews.Title: Worth the money

Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: This replaces a first generation Kindle Fire and is much faster, etc.  this Kindle is very light and sturdy.  Recommend
Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Author: Dotti Spillman
Reviews.Content: Quick shipping, great packaging. love the item.  Bought for my 8yo daughter, she is on it every day!  We have an IPAD also, but with this she watches shows, plays games, reads, just overall wonderful item, half the price of an Ipad.
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Dr. Oceanfront "Oceanfront"
Reviews.Content: For the price, this unit is a steal especially when compared to other units out there.I got this as a gift for a 14 year old friends daughter and she just loves it!  She uses it everyday, and after seeing the screens and quality, I wondered why I was thinking of buying myself a $700 ipad!If everything I owned was not Apple, I might have bought this little unit.  It also looks very slick and I love Amazon service.Great bang for your buck!
Reviews.Title: For the price great little unit

Reviews.Author: teresakay
Reviews.Content: I searched for the perfect tablet and this Kindle fire HDX is the best.  It has everything that you will ever need with a great price.  Very lightweight and the mayday is awesome.  If you have any questions you just select the mayday button and a representative comes on live chat with you to help.  Pretty awesome.....
Reviews.Title: Great tablet

Reviews.Author: orchid1417
Reviews.Content: Our 3 daughters are thrilled with their kindle fire HDX's. Easy to navigate, add apps, movies, music and books.  Usually when it gets quite in the house trouble is brewing, but now they are playing educational games and reading books galore!
Reviews.Title: Awesome buy for our daughters

Reviews.Author: jb231009
Reviews.Content: For the college student:I got this to replace my 2 crapped out laptops. As a 5th year student I really didn't want to (nor could I afford) a new laptop that will be replaced by a professional computer in a year or so. So, I thought on black Friday why not try for $180. I own the 2012 kindle fire and thought it was this seemed to be a good choice. I got a Bluetooth keyboard for this to make it a "real laptop", because I mainly write essays and it does well. I like this new kindle so far. I can type with a Bluetooth keyboard on word apps which helps a lot for the normal college student. I am not a tech geek or anything, just needed something to get me by for the last school year. I had a normal 15" laptop then a netbook that both died out in college so I really didn't want another expensive computer and this is a good replacement. I don't plan on this being a forever replacement and I don't think other people should either. I use it to type and play games on it. The kindle is really thin which I love. At first I was hesitant because I was fine with the 2012 fire but I needed something better to write essays on. Now I think this is new one is fine. Overall, if your looking for a basic tablet that can do things like write in polaris app (or in king soft, whatever) and play app games this does very well. If your looking for a tablet that is more photo sharing, personal details, bigger screen, etc this may not be for you. I haven't had a problem with it and advise a person to get Prime with it, you can download movies and watch them without internet (great feature).Down sides:Yes it's a kindle, you can't have a screen photo and they're adds but for the normal person thats not much a bothersome.The power button and a volume button are on the back of it. I find it a hard transition coming from old fire to the new one. It beats me why they'd put them on the back. I find the power button on back a little bit of an annoyance but new fire users may not. This also makes it an issue because if you have an old kindle fire you'll need to buy a whole new case and NO OTHER KINDLE FIRE CASES WILL FIT IT! (You have to specifically buy an HDX one). I bought one thinking they would but nope. Normal CASES cover the power button on back; I still use the non-fitting case because I don't want to spend more money on a case.It is only 7", no surprise there. But it is on the tiny side for tablets. I didn't mind in on the 2012 kindle fire and I don't now. If you have a giant cell phone it may seem odd because they're close in size but I don't have a high tech phone so this really doesn't bother me.This version does have a front facing camera, I don't know how many MP. I can't seem to find that info (but I haven't searched that hard). I tried it out and it's okay, prob like 3MP or so.
Reviews.Title: For a college student

Reviews.Author: L. Cotman
Reviews.Content: It is very fast. The picture is gorgeous. I love it. I owned the previous version and this is a  very nice upgrade from that  one.
Reviews.Title: It Rocks

Reviews.Author: Keionna Williams
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle for my son as a xmas present and now my husband and I can not stay off of it.  It's super fast, super clear and the mayday button is awesome. He loves it!!!! We all love it so much that my husband and I are both buying the Kindle fire hdx 8.9.
Reviews.Title: Love it!!!

Reviews.Author: Toreri
Reviews.Content: Great iPad substitute. I have a iPhone 5 and a iMac. I am also a kindle owner. I think the kindle fire's a great tablet for the money. My father has a nexus 7. After receiving the kindle as a Christmas gift, I realized that this version of android is much more user friendly for him than the native android app. The kindle is user friendly and offers ease of use without the cost of Apple. Mayday feature is brilliant. The speakers sound is pleasantly clear. The blue tint around the edge of the screen that otherscomplain about is barely noticeable.
Reviews.Title: very good buy. a great ipad.alternative

Reviews.Author: Frances Zoller
Reviews.Content: Love how convenient it is to have so I can look things up so quickly!  I don't go anywhere without it!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire~!

Reviews.Author: Ellery Higgins
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife for Christmas this year.  My one major complaint with the device itself is that (at the time I purchased it) there was a difference of $50 to not have the "Special Offers" lock screen.  It sounds cool on their site to have it anyway...but....they're just advertisements on the lock screen that take up the whole page.  Soo...instead of microtransactions inside of an app to get rid of ads, you have to pay $50 more to not have these on your lock screen.  Not cool Amazon...not cool.EDIT: I purchased this on a Black Friday sale, to clarify, it is no longer $50 difference in the devices for the ad/non-ad ones, but at the time, one was on a large sale and the other wasn't...making it a large price difference.Second complaint which is also the awesomeness of this product.  With the purchase of the Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD, and the Kindle Fire HDX, you get free 500 coins for the app store after registering it and adding billing information.  I completed this...and 0 coins.  Soo....being curious, I used the "Mayday" button on there to contact support.  Due to the friendliness of the agent that responded, I found out I was only like the 10th person to use it that morning, as it's still a new feature, and the agents are new to this too!  She was EXTREMELY helpful and kind and informed me it could take a couple hours to receive this promotional credit.Last but not least...the power cable.  It is at a FUNKY angle on the tablet in order to keep with the contoured angle of the tablet edge.  It angles upward while plugged in properly.  If not careful, I can see this charging port or cable becoming damaged easily.Beyond those few issues, this is an excellent tablet, it's perfectly sized, fits well in the hand, the screen is bright (I see none of the blue tint as others are describing), and the support is phenomenal!
Reviews.Title: Awesome...yet semi-invasive.

Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: My wife already had a Kindle.  I cannot remember whether I bought it at a Brick and Mortar place or through the Wonderful World of Amazon(tm).  It was an older, very lightweight model, in black and white and all shades in between.  She needs lightweight because of severe Rheumatoid Arthritis.  Anyway, it was time for an upgrade.  Since I have the Kindle Fire HD 7", HD Display, Wi-Fi and love it, the fact that the HDX was lighter and did more was a selling point.Although she's not used it much at this point, everything is what she wants.  It does weigh a bit more than her original Kindle, but it's a con she's willing to live with.
Reviews.Title: A Christmas Gift She Loves

Reviews.Author: Shaun Kanak
Reviews.Content: I finally bought my first tablet.  Since we are long-time Amazon Prime customers, I wanted a tablet that would play Amazon Prime video as well as Hulu+ and Netflix.  And, of course, a good Kindle experience.  That narrowed the field to either iPad or Kindle Fire.  After the Fire HDX came out it was clear that Amazon had some serious hardware.  The latest Kindle OS helped sell me too.I do miss the Google apps that I have on my droid phone but fortunately some of them can be side-loaded if you find the apk file on the web.Reading books and graphic novels is a great experience.Watching videos (both streaming and saved to the kindle) is great.Sound quality is very good.I'm still getting to know the Free Time feature for my young kids but it looks promising.Bottom line...if you like to read (on a tablet) and watch video then you will have a hard time beating the Fire HDX and when you consider the price, there's no contest.  I'm so happy with my 7" Fire HDX that I bought the 8.9" Fire HDX for my wife and kids.
Reviews.Title: A great tablet

Reviews.Author: Mark Freeman
Reviews.Content: 1)  We bought this tablet after hearing great things about Freetime and the ability it gives you to limit exposure to your kids for content you don't want them to have access to.  However, we didn't know we couldn't let our kids access music while locked in freetime.  It has been a very trying couple of days while I have tried to find a work around.  From other reviews, I see that there were workarounds before, but Amazon has closed those off with it latest software release.  One of my daughters is very disappointed and I don't blame her.2)  The mayday button has come in handy for me already in the first couple of days of use.  They have been very quick to respond and other than not being able to help solve my music issue, they have been knowledgeable, polite, and very helpful.
Reviews.Title: Wish I knew more about Freetime before I bought

Reviews.Author: W. Bradley
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit basically for three reasons: 1) a convenient portal for browsing in Amazon.com - I hate going to stores anymore and I find Amazon to be a convenient one-stop shop for most things I need and the Kindle does that very well which is what Amazon had in mind, 2) a convenient and quick way to browse various internet sites that I check regularly w/o having to fire up my laptop; 3) as an eBook/video/music platform that's extremely portable. I bought the Kindle because of all the above and the features were great too. The display was very good, the price was right and the on-demand help feature was nice too. For those buyers who have in mind of downloading a lot of games, etc. from the internet might want to look at another platform but if your needs mirror mine then the Kindle is hard to beat.
Reviews.Title: Meets My Needs

Reviews.Author: Nathan Yardley
Reviews.Content: Awesome device just a little lacking in good apps from amazon. Sound and picture are quality though. A few more decent apps and it would be much better.
Reviews.Title: Not bad

Reviews.Author: Becki Rasmussen
Reviews.Content: I am liking my new Kindle so far very well, I had another Kindle that was 15 months old that would no longer charge or hold a charge. I have spoken with others that have had the same problem. I am just hoping the new Kindle lasts longer than the first one. I have purchased 2 other Kindles that are about 1 year old for my two grandsons and i hope  their Kindles last.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" Review

Reviews.Author: Les Mack
Reviews.Content: I LOVE it! I have a Paperwhite with 3g WI-FI and thisexceeds it by FAR. The 4 G Wi-Fi works reallywell, the images POP out at you from the HDX display it's almost like 3-d. The battery recovery timeis very quick.
Reviews.Title: REALLY COOL!!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I just updated from the original 7 to the new HDX version, and am glad I did. Overall it works better, faster, and so far no problems.It seems to have a bit longer battery life, but that could still be improved. Beautiful new screen image. One new feature though really impressed me. I found it by accident. Speech to Text is activated by a microphone button on the keyboard. It works amazingly well for me,  It was worth the upgrade all by itself. I spent in excess of $100.00 for a program for my PC, and have been disappointed with it. It is difficult to use, requiring many key strokes to get it going, not to mention the necessary use of a headset. The Kindle is very accurate in getting down what I say, not 100% yet, but closer than I can do with my fingers on the PC. Now, all I have to do is learn to speak in commas and periods. That unfortunately it can not do by itself. Just push the microphone button, keep your hand away from the microphone area, and talk.
Reviews.Title: Talk to the kindle, it listens.

Reviews.Author: Claudine Jancik
Reviews.Content: I  like  everything  about  the  Kindle Fire HDX. It  has  great  color ,  is easy  to  use and  I  can  read  anywhere  day  or  night,  which  was  my  primary  purpose in  buying it.
Reviews.Title: Loving  it

Reviews.Author: kiracatto
Reviews.Content: I really like my kindle fire hdx more then the ipad2 for the size and weight and reading books, the blue outline doesn't bother me or interfere with my reading ,What I don't like is just like ipad you can't use outside apps without indangering your system, I wanted something that would let me use diffrent apps, I'm hoping that Amazon will add more apps I want, but all in all I love my kindle fire hdx and you can really see the diffrence when watching movies the graphics are wonderful.
Reviews.Title: Better then my ipad2 but!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Linekin Lady
Reviews.Content: Just got the Kindle HDX and absolutely love it. Had a question about operation and within 10 seconds of clicking on the help icon, a live person pops up in a small window and answers my question in a quick and easy way. Great HD viewing, fast and so easy to use. Great vehicle also to use as a secondary device if your computer has issues and can't be used. Can easily cruise the net, check email, watch movies and of course read a book. Highly recommend!
Reviews.Title: Love it !

Reviews.Author: ShopsLot
Reviews.Content: we own a few tablets in the home...to give reference ipad air and mini retina on verizon, wifi ipad 4, note 10.1 samsung and now this kindle hdx.I do have to mention that my first hdx arrived but something was wrong with battery life both charging and usage. also one long side of screen had too much blue shadow.  I almost returned it but decided to give replacement a try with the great customer service rep on phone with amazon.  The 2nd one arrived and battery life is great. with some minimal use over the past week, still at 40%...awesome! Also the blue shadow much less on replacement kindle as well.I do love Amazon and actually love the special offers myself on my kindle but you can opt out when purchasing.  I love the speaker volume on the hdx for such a little tablet more than sufficient.  beautiful screen, browser works well and smooth.  plenty of storage with 64gb version...downloaded 3 x Harry Potter in hd but not biggest hd file from amazon library with still plenty of room left.  great for trips out and content in purse to keep entertained.  no, amazon App Store is not as vast nor as lovely as iOS but main things I use are there....Facebook, candy crush, pulse, things of this nature. I now love my free book a month from kindle lending library. I have a young child in home so love the kindle free time for her books so she can't switch to 50 shades series on accident...yes!  great for skype calls, I heart radio, fitbit tracking and mainly reading kindle books. with this kindle hdx...I will not be buying a second mini ipad retina in the home.  almost wish I got the verizon version though. happy purchase with the $50 off special.
Reviews.Title: love it and great amazon service

Reviews.Author: Big H
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it. Very easy to set up and use right out of the box. And I got a good deal on it. I would definitely recommend this to every one I know. Great item I cant say enough about it.
Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Author: Marcia
Reviews.Content: My friend has one and he gave it to me for about a week. I loved it! Reading books will never be the same. It has wi fi, facebook and all that so I don't even have to turn my PC on. It would've been even better if it had more apps to choose from. Otherwise it's a great buy and the price is right!
Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Author: Ckk
Reviews.Content: Screen quality is amazing even though it flickers at time. It's so light that you can have it in your hand for hours either reading or watching videos. Simple access to Amazon ecosystem to buy more things or more kindle books.
Reviews.Title: Awesome entertainment device that's light in your hands

Reviews.Author: webbrat
Reviews.Content: I like to read for 5 or 6 hours a night sometimes longer if I can't sleep and even if I place the kindle on "airplane mode" I don't get that much time on my battery.  I really worry for when I am traveling and can't get to a place to plug it in. I also worry because my connection where one has to plug it to recharge is getting sloppy.  I really have move the cord around to get it to charge and then hope the air currents don't change it.  This happens with both the cords I own.  This is also the 2nd hdx I've had.  This one is only 3 weeks old and now it is starting up with problems.  So while I love everything about my kindle (I don't even mind the ads) I am really in a spot with what to do now. This is also the reason for four stars.
Reviews.Title: I love my kindle but,

Reviews.Author: A. Wertheim "werthla"
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle HD, iPad, and Surface 2 just for background.I have a lot of problems with HD in terms of its claim to being a tablet - the internet is very fussy, it's slow and is simply not reliable as a tablet.  But it's a great E reader.I wanted a good 7 inch tablet.  I bought a returned the Google Nexus 7.  It was great except for no browser having a reading pane which is important in a small tablet.  You would think Google would have this in Chrome but no.  The screen is the best in class.I went to Best Buy and they had the HD and HDX side by side.  I compared the internet and there was no comparison - they HDX was very fast so I bought it to try out.  Happy to report that this is now a true tablet in that the Silk browser is much improved,, the quad core makes all the difference, the internet is now very usable and fast.HDX also has improvements over the HD - you can slide up from the bottom to access recently used programs which is very important if you need to switch between apps since only Surface allows you to keep two apps open simultaneously in the tablet world.  This works better than iPad.A page from other androids - you swipe down to see email and other notifications.The power button is now accessible!Size is smaller and slimmer.Some have noticed that there is a purple haze to the background.  That's true and that's something you have to judge for yourself if it bothers you.There is a limit on the number of tabs you can open on the Silk browser.Battery life is improved over HD.  It now comes with a cable and wall charger.There is no rear camera.  If that's important to you, consider the iPad Mini.  OR you can buy a real camera for the price difference.In summary, there is really no reason to buy the HD unless the price is $100.  The HDX is now a good competitive tablet.  The app store remains a problem if you depend on apps for games.  I have found some surprisingly good specialty apps.This is smaller than the iPad Mini and almost half the price.  Unless you are trapped in the Apple ecosystem and need their apps, (there isn't much you can't get from the web sites) this is a good alternative.
Reviews.Title: Finally, Amazon got this mostly right!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I wish I had WiFi in my home, so I can enjoy it even more. Love May Day button- the people have really helped me a number of times. Don't understand why my book pages don't turn like the advertisement- someone needs to tell us why. Easy to download- great color and sound too. This is my 4th Kindle-- got to control myself on upgrades BUT the people I have given them to have enjoyed my spending!!
Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTELY fantastic

Reviews.Author: Karen M. Hooker "luv2read"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire HDX, it's the perfect adult companion, I take it with me everywhere. It's fully equipped with games, books, movies and much more.It's easy to use and I have to hide it from my husband and two year old daughter who seem to use it more than me. It has a wide variety of free applications and the quality of the Hd screen is perfect for reading a nd viewing movies. It's never a dull moment with the Kindle Fire HDX,  I plan on purchasing two more so I can enjoy it without interruption. Lastly, the price is reasonable, can't be beat!!!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Greg Shires
Reviews.Content: My mom loves her "basic" kindle.  I wanted to get her one that lights up and has access to internet, facebook, email, etc.  She loves it, so far she still just reads on it but I'm hoping she'll eventually use it for more.
Reviews.Title: It's perfect for mom

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I kinda wish I bought the bigger one but i still love it.  I love that I can borrow a book.
Reviews.Title: Great picture

Reviews.Author: Al Carpenter
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replace an earlier model Kindle Reader for my wife and, already, she loves it!  Bigger screen and easier to use than her smart phone, yet perfect size for her purse and, of course, much more sophisticated than the black and white reader.
Reviews.Title: An excellent device!

Reviews.Author: L. Hayes
Reviews.Content: I only got this today. The color is amazing!I did download some puff files I cannot find on the Adobe app but their in here somewhere. I'm sure I'll figure it out.Mobile files downloaded great. My books were on I n seconds that I'll had on a kindle app. It's not too heavy not extremely light either. Nice size as I have a tablet and a nook tablet. I like the size of this a lot better and the screen.It's just so bright and vivid. I really haven't used  it for anything else yet but I bet games are amazing.I definitely recommend. I have a HD tablet and this HDX blows the color away. Usage is easy and starts up easily not a lot of work.out of the box which I always dread.  Battery seems to hold well. I've been reading for about 4  hrs and it's half drained. If your considering buying just do it you won't regret it.
Reviews.Title: love it so far

Reviews.Author: Lathanette Creasman
Reviews.Content: Ok I am not a techy person but like to keep up with what the new gadgets are. I never buy technical toys as I call them. Family has been trying to get me to get one of these for over a year. Well, I LOVE IT!!!! I got it because I am in a bookclub and everyone uses theirs to for their books and other avenues. I am still a paperbook fan but I love the Kindle Fire HDX. Best investment I have done since a laptop.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" HDX 16GB

Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The screen is truly fantastic but the first thing I noticed was how light the device was. It blows my mind how they can pack such technology in such a small package. I am very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it to anyone.
Reviews.Title: Bright and Light

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my newest Kindle.  This is very fast, very user friendly. I recently lost my laptop, but since I have been using this tablet, I won't replace the laptop.  I have a desktop computer when I want a keyboard, or a big screen for movies.  But, this tablet is fantastic for everything else, all the time, any time.  I check email, watch movies, read books, listen to music. LOVE IT!  I took it to school and let my 5th graders take turns using it for independent reading time.  It made reading so much fun for them. I also used a timer app in class as well.  The battery life is good on this tablet.  I use my other kindles, but this is my favorite one.
Reviews.Title: My favorite Kindle

Reviews.Author: Oceansky
Reviews.Content: So far I am loving my Kidle Fire HDX.  It is fast on its downloads and I'm still playing with it to get to know all it's features.
Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Author: lloyd l bolson
Reviews.Content: device seems to work fine.  I would have given it 5 stars if it had instructions.  Being new to amazon/android platform, I am still trying to get to work in a consistent fashion.
Reviews.Title: my thoughts

Reviews.Author: Melinda Roslin
Reviews.Content: This device is totally plug n play.  Easy to use, navigation is intuitive and it's large enough to read and play games, but small enough to put in my handbag.  I'm reading books again on a regular basis because of this device.  I love it!
Reviews.Title: Great device!!

Reviews.Author: Bill Fox
Reviews.Content: I love this thing. The display is awesome and its very fast with a nice processor. Reccomend it to anyone looking for a great tablet for gaming.
Reviews.Title: great kindle hdx

Reviews.Author: catlib55
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. I am a prime member, and getting videos through prime on this is seamless and fast. I also play a few games which are fun to do. And what I use it for mostly is reading, and getting books through the Amazon store is simple and quick. Also, it came the day after I ordered it, which was a really nice surprise. I expected it in two days, but it came in one day. Way to go, Amazon!!
Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet

Reviews.Author: KBroadhead
Reviews.Content: This was a purchase for my daughter. Not only did it arrive quickly (thanks to Prime), it was easy to setup and get her books downloaded.
Reviews.Title: SWEET

Reviews.Author: Harrison
Reviews.Content: This was an early Christmas present and I'm happy I bought it.  It's used every day and performs well.  The screen and sound are amazing.  Tons of apps.  Just wish there were some other features like the ability to change wallpapers or have access to the Google Play store. There are apps that I've purchased on the Play store that I would have to repurchase if I want them on the Kindle even though they are the same app. The Mayday feature is nice to have, I've used it once and saved me from doing the research.  Nice addition that I didn't think I would use as much as I do.
Reviews.Title: Nice addition

Reviews.Author: Daniel Lavan
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sweetheart and she now can get many hours of enjoyment from it!She loves it and all she can do with it!
Reviews.Title: Sweetheart loves it!

Reviews.Author: Happylark
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed owning the new Kindle Fire for its speed and beautiful display.  My only issue is that it does not hold a charge for long, even in sleep mode.  I have found that in sleep mode, the new Fire HDX can quickly drain the battery.  Amazon should review this problem a fix it for the next version.
Reviews.Title: Nice, but does not hold a charge long enough

Reviews.Author: Sibeez "Sibeez"
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle for web surfing, reading, watching an occasional movie.  The graphics are amazing.  Connection time dramatically improved over my other Kindle.  Can't speak for anyone using it as a business tool but for home use and entertainment, I love it.
Reviews.Title: Amazing graphics

Reviews.Author: Jimmy Bob "Jimmy"
Reviews.Content: Amazing tablet. The screen is beautiful, super high resolution, like a 7inch retina iphone, with perfect color. The processor is fast. I can load webpages as fast as my laptop - never have been able to do that on a tablet before. The speakers produce the best sound I've heard from any portable device, including laptops. The tablet responds to touch the way an apple product would. Amazon has hit a home run with this one.
Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Author: Pink "Pink LA"
Reviews.Content: Great item. Looks great and the image is fantastic.  Battery only last for two to three  hours. I don't like just front camera ure feature..rather, I prefer rear camera.
Reviews.Title: battery doesn't last

Reviews.Author: CLFnyc "charlenenyc"
Reviews.Content: I really like the Kindle Fire.  I  bought one about a year ago and returned it because I felt it was too klunky.  I preferred the regular kindle with the light. I decided to try it again based on a review I got from my colleague. Loving it!
Reviews.Title: MUCH better than the previous Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Author: Mary Beth Knapp
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my new Kindle Fire HDX 7. The internet is quick and the screen very responsive to the touch.
Reviews.Title: Super!

Reviews.Author: Denise Reeder
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted. I love that I don't have to have a reading light to go with it, like I had to with my first kindle.
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Marvin M.
Reviews.Content: Not the fault of the tablet but the cover for it is difficult to keep stable on many surfaces...plain ridge cover like the HD would be a nice. option
Reviews.Title: HDX and Cover Eval

Reviews.Author: Amanda Vasquez
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the Kindle Fire HDX the picture and sound is amazing it did not disappoint what so ever. It's very easy to navigate around it, so you don't get lost.
Reviews.Title: Excited

Reviews.Author: Donna Braxton
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire! The colors are vibrant and clear, and the programs are user friendly. My granddaughter also enjoys it, and I don't have to worry about what she might get into with the kids programming. My biggest problem is getting it away from her so that I can use it!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: it is the best tablet around. only draw back is the one camera, hard to take good pics. Get one today
Reviews.Title: This is an awesome tablet

Reviews.Author: John Wuk
Reviews.Content: Works flawlessly.  Extremely fast WiFi connection.  Screen is top notch.  Light weight and great size for travel.  Easy to sideload apps.  Waiting for PS 4 to be added so I can try second screen.  Connects so much faster than my laptop find myself using it for most of my browsing.
Reviews.Title: Excellent device

Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tablet for the price and my Grandchildren love it too! Very kid friendly! They are each getting their own for Christmas!
Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the price

Reviews.Author: Marge90601 "Dog Lover"
Reviews.Content: Fast to connect to wifi, responsive keypad and screen, extra features not available on other wifi tablets, ads not intrusive, haven't even started enjoying all the features. But as soon as I started it up and got on my email, I got rid of my Motorola Xyborg which was very unresponsive, difficult to type on, hard to connect with.
Reviews.Title: I threw my Xyborg out after trying this.

Reviews.Author: Marianne Nyberg
Reviews.Content: Love the new kindle HDX.  Clarity is very sharp although still a little hard to read in the sun.  (Maybe too sharp).  Still learning all the functions.  Wish there was a way to down load a full manual, vs sections at a time.Hard to sync pictures from an android phone.Not as easy to find the prime books and movies available, but with the help of the mayday button, you easily learn.Glad I up graded.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7" HDX

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the third Kindle and second Kindle Fire I have owned.  The HDX is even sharper than the HD is.
Reviews.Title: Another step of improvement

Reviews.Author: lancebenton
Reviews.Content: Great machine.  I bought this and my wife has a Kindle Fire HD.  We also subscribe to Amazon Prime.  My squawk is that the Silk browser does not work with Hulu (previews only) and they want you to subscribe to Hulu plus.  Amazon prime offers lots of great free streaming programs but for Hulu programming I have to go back to my laptop and just use the regular web browser to go to Hulu.com  Maybe enable Hulu if you subscribe to Amazon Prime?  r/LOB
Reviews.Title: Great machine, enable Hulu with the Silk browser.

Reviews.Author: Goldfinger
Reviews.Content: love my Kindle, the picture quality is great; however the internet is not the greatest. I did not buy it for the internet so I would have to say I am very pleased with my Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX are great

Reviews.Author: markh
Reviews.Content: I like the display, memory and speed.While reading and charging the usb cable must come out of the top. Add on the origami stand and I can not open it like a book (right to left).Since yesterday's update the device rebooted 2 or 3 times in 10 minutes while reading.This also places the light sensor were my hand swipe hovers causing backlight to dim.The volume does not APPEAR as loud as the fire hd-7.The battery life is definitely 10-20% shorter than the fire hd-7.Looking forward to loading it up with prime videos offline...8D
Reviews.Title: I enjoy the enhancements, with a few exceptions

Reviews.Author: Bonnie J. Seagroves
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT tablet!  I had been debating whether to purchase something like this for years.  I am not someone who goes out and buys the latest and greatest- I keep things until they no longer work.  Last year I purchased a Kindle fire for my granddaughter who is 9, and I had the chance to use it a couple of times... This one has better picture and better sound.  It is a basic model- perfect for the person who travels and needs to check email, read, play games, and watch movies/listen to music.  I am in love with this and will keep it until it dies, just like my disc walkman!
Reviews.Title: This is great, perfect for the traveler...

Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: I purchased for my wife, who at 69, is not a wiz and computers, no matter how long I teach her how to use it.  She did learn to sort of master the Kindle keyboard...(how hard is it to push a button to turn a page?), but could never learn how to remove the books she read from the reader (backspace)!But, she loves her new Kindle fire: the color, the finger motions, all seem to make intuitive sense to her, so the calls for help are few and far between.  The next step is for her do e mail on it and considering the issues she has had with both lap top and smaller pc; we will see.  I tried it and it is very simple and works well.  She is a single finger type artist, so the lack of physical keyboard will not be an issue.She is primarily a book reader and she loves seeing the book cover!
Reviews.Title: Fantastic Colors and Great Book Reader and E mail Function

Reviews.Author: Frank Latchford
Reviews.Content: Very nice and love it! This kindle is nicer than my old one! Much clearer especially for when I am playing my games!
Reviews.Title: New kindle

Reviews.Author: Sharon Mcclellan "Garden Nana"
Reviews.Content: I really like this Kindle Fire HDX.  Great for travel.  I can access my accounts, read a book, enjoy Facebook and much, much more while traveling.  Much better than lugging around a big laptop.
Reviews.Title: Great Kindle!

Reviews.Author: Robert B. Miller
Reviews.Content: This unit is more powerful than my original Fire. I can surf the web more easily, and playing videos and music is a dream.
Reviews.Title: Like it

Reviews.Author: Joseph J DeLeone
Reviews.Content: I really like Kindle.  Some of the apps that I like have not worked. I am still learning how to utilize all it has to offer.
Reviews.Title: Apps

Reviews.Author: D.J.B. "water man"
Reviews.Content: A pleasant improvement from the 7" Kindle HD that I sold to my brother. This 7" HDX model has a more detailed screen that makes the smaller sized screen more useful for web searches and emails.
Reviews.Title: Great Screen Detail

Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Best thing ever bigger than the iPod smaller than the iPad perfect size for my hands I can get to things within 1 sec
Reviews.Title: I CAN GET TO THINGS WITHIN 1SEC

Reviews.Author: coulter
Reviews.Content: I have the original Kindle fire which I love but this one ....wow!!!!!  It powers up fast and I like that it will go to sleep but wakes up fast.  It move from screen to screen with the greatest of ease.  It is not hard to get around.  I just love it more!!!!!!  Sorry original kindle, but remember you were my first.  :)
Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: AMBERISAAC55
Reviews.Content: It's wonderful haven't had any problems at all. Packaging was wonderful, was very nice and just opening my new toy was so exciteing like being a child on Christmas. I love it so much great quality but my only wish is that I wish it had the camera on the back but that's the only thing I don't like
Reviews.Title: my new favorite toy

Reviews.Author: Jeannette
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX. I can't really complain about it. It's a great tablet for the price you pay.
Reviews.Title: LOVE IT

Reviews.Author: Sami B
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle and I use it every day. I love cloud for all of my pictures. I love to be able to go from facebook or pinterest to reading my books, to playing games all in one sitting. Best toy I have. ;-)
Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Author: MIGUEL ANGEL CALLAN
Reviews.Content: Simply greatMy first kindle and I have had no problems. I recommend it strongly. No regrets at all pals
Reviews.Title: great !!!

Reviews.Author: S. TANNENBAUM
Reviews.Content: Easy to set-up and use for a novice.  Tried Android based unit & after 5 hours gave up.  This I had set-up & running within 15 minutes.
Reviews.Title: E$asy to set-up

Reviews.Author: KAYCEE
Reviews.Content: From its design to display to speed and functionality, Kindle Fire HDX is a very good tablet. Crystal clear HD display with the fastest processor in a tablet make it an attractive buy. A rear camera would have been superb along with a robust app library like the Google Play store. Also support for Google apps would't hurt. Great HD experience with Amazon Prime and Netflix. VUDU and other video apps need "sideloading" at the moment. Reading experience is amazing. Makes up for a great holiday gift this year.
Reviews.Title: Hard to beat the price to feature ratio with this Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Jeff Fraley
Reviews.Content: I travel frequently and my wife got this for me before my last long trip.  Excellent choice for reading books and watching HD movies.
Reviews.Title: Perfect travel companion

Reviews.Author: Inga
Reviews.Content: It took me a long time to make the decision to buy a Kindle and now I am so happy that I did.  I can buy books and have them immediately and can easily take my "books" with me to read anywhere.  The lighted screen is wonderful as is the size. I looked at the Kindle Fire but this model is so much more user friendly.
Reviews.Title: Love this Kindle

Reviews.Author: Zach Braniger
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire hdx it has a great speakers and display is awesome I hpoe other rate 5
Reviews.Title: kindle

Reviews.Author: C. Aronson
Reviews.Content: I was going to buy a Kindle a few years back, but instead, due to finances, went with an inexpensive tablet. I am now the proud and happy owner of the Kindle Fire HDX 7" 32 GB and loving it! I love the speed with which the pages load, and the clarity of the pages is unreal! I love reading and the pages are so easy to see in any light...regular room light, dark room, and outside. Playing games that I had previously played on my old tablet is a whole new experience. The games are more vibrant, and no hesitation.I haven't used the Kindle for music yet, but based on what other have said, I am sure it will be great.I do like that they are now including the rapid charger with the Kindle, rather than having to purchase one separately. I have not had the need to use the "Mayday" button yet, but it is nice to know that it is there when I need it.I have not had this Kindle too long, but I can't find anything I don't like. Should that change, I will update this review. I also want to add that I am a Senior Citizen and want to let other Seniors know that they should not be afraid to buy a Kindle...it is so easy to set up (open box, register) and use!While I was having regrets about not buying a Kindle the first time, I am glad I had to wait because I now have one that has been improved and that I expect to have for some time.
Reviews.Title: Glad I had to wait to buy a Kindle

Reviews.Author: Sara Rice
Reviews.Content: Another great Amazon Kindle Fire. Super easy to set it up.  Open the box and turn it on.  Register it and you are good to go!I purchased this as a gift and my daughter loves her new Fire HDX.  It is smaller and lighter than her previous Fire and wow it does a great job.  My daughter uses it to listen to music and read books.  It also has a great browser so it's super fast for her to search the web.  I really like how she can also watch her favorite shows and movies and with Prime it's so worth it.There are plenty of Apps and I am really impressed how fast it is.  I would consider it as a really nice tablet and for the price, you really can't beat it.
Reviews.Title: The new Fire HDX 32 GB is AWESOME

Reviews.Author: Sally in Colorado
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire tablet is finally really a tablet.  I love it for reading, doing email and running apps.  I am an app developer and I am have written an app for iPad, and android. So I have tried them all.  I own Samsung Tab 3, Nexus 7, 2 iPads and a kindle (1st gen). So I am very familiar with all these tablets.  I would have given it 5 stars, but the apps on iPad are better and more of them. It could also use a back camera to be competitive but I never use that anyway.  For the price, Amazon has done an excellent job on this device.  I even used the "May day" service a few times when I got it.Later:  I am finding the battery usage frustrating.  The battery doesn't last as long as my laptop.  It runs done faster than any other tablet that I own (iPad, Samsung Tab 3, Nexus 7). So I am down grading my rating.
Reviews.Title: A great tablet

Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: First tablet ever and I LOVE IT!! Has everything I need and more!So glad I purchased it and the price was the best! I've waited for this and couldn't be happier!
Reviews.Title: Excellent!!

Reviews.Author: RandomReader
Reviews.Content: Please be aware of the blue haze on the border of the screen.  According to Amazon the haze is an unavoidable side effect of the screen architecture, meaning it can't be fixed.  If you use any app with a white background (books, web, etc) this will become an unacceptable distraction.Other than that the device is great. One fatal flaw, however, still spells doom.
Reviews.Title: Blue haze is very distracting

Reviews.Author: CD
Reviews.Content: Admittedly, I purchased this because of price. As my first pseudo-Android tablet, I found it to be a very limited tablet based on Apps available and limitations on installing true Android apps, including a real internet browser.Battery life for active use seems to be as-advertised; however I do not expect the batteries to fully drain while in sleep mode - this is the case with my unit.Screen quality is superb for a 7" tablet - the blue-haze issue on the borders is somewhat annoying when reading books.  Sound quality is second to none when compared to my other tablets.  Mayday is a cool feature - in a couple of instances I received great support and help; in others, it was anything but helpful.I am not a Prime subscriber - even that has limitations over other alternative media providers. This further convinced me not to subscribe.Overall, my disappointment stems from the limitation enforced with the Android apps available (c'mon, no YouTube or real Browser?), the questionable battery life when not in use, and the blue haze of this otherwise great display.Finally, I saw a recent TV ad comparing the HDX to an iPad... If anything, that ad is pushing me AWAY from any future Kindle purchases - you truly get what you pay for.
Reviews.Title: Overall: Below Expectations

Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: My family and I.own an iPad air, three kindles, several iPhones... you get the point.  For the money, this is far and away the one I consider the best.  Other tablets have their points, but this little guy does everything I can throw at it and more.  Unless you plan on dropping a ton of cash, the fire HDX can't be beat.Only issue I've had with it is I wish the kindle app.store was as extensive as their competitors.
Reviews.Title: love it.

Reviews.Author: Victoria Hudson
Reviews.Content: The device worked right out of the box. Screen quality is stunning and video amazing. With the origami case there is some heft to the device and over time a unsupported hand holding it would tire. The origami case is a creative solution that works fairly well as a functional case btw. The help capability to instantly video chat with a tech is a positive experience. My Kindle arrived with special offers enabled, though I'd ordered without them. An email to customer support resulted in a reply within a couple hours, on Christmas Eve no less, with the sponsored ads removed, no charge. Incidentally, I think it would be useful if there was a way to opt back in for that content in order to receive the special offers in an unobtrusive manner. If this was controllable by the user that might be useful.I rate the poor marketing due to the following information in the product description: "Stay productive on the go with ultra-fast web browsing, built-in OfficeSuite, and updated e-mail and calendar support for Gmail, Outlook, and more"There is no built-in OfficeSuite. There is a built-in VIEWER.  A viewer is a very different product from an office suite. One can read documents but not be very productive if unable to produce documents, spreadsheets or presentations. This in my mind is just false and misleading advertising. A deciding factor in purchasing this product was the presence of a built-in office suite tool. You won't even know this either, unless you go looking on the product forum, as I and others have done, posting "where is the built-in OfficeSuite? That should tell Amazon something - consumers are expecting a true suite of office tools. Either include one or more accurately portray what is on board.I chose this device after one too many crashes with my first gen iPad. So far, I'm happy with the technology. It's intuitive, easy to use and the images on the screen are exceedingly clear and sharp. Set-up was easy and fast. The very simple on board customer service is in strong contrast to getting help from Apple, which is no where near as easy. That's a definite positive factor for this product. I do not however like a leading advertised facet of the product to turn out as misleading particularly when that facet is what helped me decide to give this alternative technology a try.
Reviews.Title: Great technology, poor marketing

Reviews.Author: GCP
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a christsmas gift.  So far we love it!  Was very easy to set up and start using immediatly.
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Tim Whippo
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the original Kindle Fire.Compared to the original Kindle Fire, the HDX 7" is noticeably lighter and easier to hold.The quad core processor is very, very fastHDX display is awesome!!
Reviews.Title: Sweet!!!

Reviews.Author: June Wiatroski
Reviews.Content: I received my kindle HDX on 12/11/13. I have called 4 times with freezing problems.  lcons that were deleted still appeared on home screen .  I spoke to  tech who was hard to understand. After close to an hour,  I requested to talk to a manager. I had to go back to factory default. For a new Kindle  I should not have to do this and freezing problems should not be happening.If this continues I want a new Kindle 7" HDX.review written 12/22/13
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7" HDX problems

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tablet is the best 7" tablet available.  Its lighter and the battery lasts longer than the new nexus 7 and I personally think the screen has better color reproduction and contrast.  I had both and compared side by side, the Kindle was just all around better.  HOWEVER, no access to google voice, hangouts, maps, Music, keep, gmail, docs, google calendar, and chrome makes this tablet limited in its awesomeness.  I use a laptop for most of my internet and "productivity" related tasks so no integration with the google ecosystem isn't a deal breaker for me.  But it sure would be nice to be able to have hangouts, keep, maps, and voice.  Almost 100% of my IMing happens in hangouts or facebook chat, neither of which are in the Amazon market, and I would love to check my texts with google voice on the tablet.  No gmail, chrome, docs, or calendar isn't a big deal because the substitutes they have are good enough, and no music is understandable because Amazon has their own music app BUT for light social applications and looking at Maps I really wish amazon would make a deal with Google or create  decent native apps that integrates with them.With that being said, I still like the HDX 7" better than the nexus 7 tablet because of the seamless integration with the amazon ecosystem and amazing access to content through prime. Its so easy to watch movies, play games, read comics, and read books that what little leisure time I have is spent within the amazon ecosystem.  Movie/television integration is easier and more convenient than netflix on android and books look as good as they can on a tablet.  Great product!
Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet except for google integration

Reviews.Author: Debbie "Let your smile change the world, not ...
Reviews.Content: I teach computers and tech to people with different needs and I haven't found anyone that this isn't the perfect answer :)  So far I have 4 clients and 3 family members I have "convinced" to get one.  I only wish I had one too :)  My turn will come soon I know it will :)  Maybe Amazon will give me a credit for all the Fires I help sell and I will buy one with that :)  So just incase let them know my review helped you decide :)  I am kidding :)  only about the credit.  I am very serious about how wonderful the Fire is and how useful it is for just about everything and everyone :)  Please ask questions before buying to make sure because you want to be so happy when the box arrives that it makes you so excited for at least a month or two :) :) :)
Reviews.Title: I recommend this highly to everyone for every need and want :)

Reviews.Author: wcfbrat
Reviews.Content: I had the first generation kindle and loved it.  I chose this new kindle because of its weight and battery life expectancy and I have not been disappointed.  The visual display is so clear and the criticism of the blue tinge on the outskirts of the display screen is not noticeable and does not take away the reading pleasure.  Overall, I am totally satisfied with this product and highly recommend it.
Reviews.Title: Totally recommend!
